Author: Mirza M Aklakuzzaman
Text:
Post: Voice System Engineer
Description:
BFIN Group Plc, BFIN IT Pvt Ltd brands Tellpe.
Tellpe is looking for a creative and hard working individuals to participate in the development of an innovative and ground breaking suite of products destined for the general public looking to save money on their phone calls and specifically targeted at smart phone or tablet users.
As a member of the voice development team the voice systems application developer will have the following responsibilities:
Development and maintenance of a bespoke voice platform based around the Freeswitch opensource voice platform, MySQL databases and OpenSips proxies.
Development of web interfaces for customer portal allowing users to access their accounts etc
Development of internal operational tools
Be available for operational emergencies
Assist customer service department in troubleshooting
Participate in the design of new products
Participate in the design of new architectures
QA / testing of solutions
Must have skills:
Freeswitch and Lua scripting
MySQL database knowledge
Prior experience building IVR type applications using Freeswitch
Prior experience building scalable, redundant, robust telecom solutions with Freeswitch
Preferred qualifications:
Practical hands on experience with Cisco Pix / ASA firewalls
Networking
VOIP
Java or C++ skills
Linux operating systems (CentOS, Ubuntu server)
LUA scripting
Website development skills (Joomla / HTML)
Telecoms knowledge
Ability to architect and implement scalable, distributed systems
Previous experience in a telecom environment (Call center, calling cards, PBX etc)
Experience in a similar role would be a plus
Creativity and ability to think outside of the box

Experience:
2+ years experience in a similar role
or a beginner having done an internship in a similar position
Educations:
BSc. in CSE or higher in a Computing or Telecommunications related field.
Salary: Negotiable
Office Time:
9:30 AM - 6:00 PM
Lunch & Snacks will be provided
Office location: 2/23, Razia Sultana Road, Mohammadpur, Dhaka
Email your updated CV to - finbco@gmail.com
Please mention 'Voice Systems Engineer' in the subject line.
Deadline: 04/02/2019

Author: Asif Seraje
Text:
Company: PeopleNTech Limited
Company website link for details: www.peoplentech.net
Vacancy: 2
Employment Status: Internship.
Job Descriptions:
We are looking for a Communications Executive to manage our online and offline communication with clients and increase brand awareness.
Communications Executive responsibilities include distributing promotional material, responding to customers’ queries and comments on social media and networking. If you have experience in identifying and building long-term relationships with target audiences, we’d like to meet you. Ultimately, you will act as our brand’s voice to impress our customers and attract new clients.
Responsibilities
• Promote our products and services
• Advertise our company and products/services on various media
• Produce marketing copy for our website
• Craft and send regular newsletters with company updates
• Track ROI for marketing campaigns
• Join social media groups and professional platforms to discuss industry-related topics
• Monitor corporate website and social media pages and address clients’ queries
• Network with industry experts and potential clients to drive brand awareness
• Gather customer feedback to inform sales and product teams
• A wide degree of creativity and latitude
• Strong knowledge and understanding of current trends in digital media/social media.
• Self-motivated with a positive and professional approach to management
• Provides advice, counsel, education and service to departments concerning IT issues and trends in the IT industry.
Educational Requirements:
 Bachelor of BBA / Bachelor of Science (BSc) in CSE.
Additional Requirements
• Both males and females are allowed to apply.
• Get preference from CSE background.
• Should possess excellent management skills (communication, collaboration, relationship management).
• Must be professional and punctual.
• Willing to learn technical skill
If you are interested then Drop your CV to tanisha@piit.us by January 20, 2020.
**Please mention the job title “Internship for Communication Executive” in the subject line of the mail.

Author: TechCare
Text:
Technical Documentation Specialist
Orbund is a US-based software company looking for tech-savvy writers for its Bangladesh office. In this dynamic role, you are expected to have impeccable English writing skills with a passion to learn about new technologies. The day to day activity of a technical writer would primarily include making simple to understand Help and Support materials for Orbund's highly complex SaaS application suite and responding to business proposals for international clients.
No prior experience is required as long as you have great writing skills and a problem-solving attitude.
Job Title: Technical Documentation Specialist
Website: www.orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 2
Company Name: Orbund LLC
Company Description:
Orbund is an education management solution provider focused primarily on higher education. Headquartered in Kansas, USA, Orbund has been providing education management solutions for over 14 years. Orbund Student Information System is being used by over 250 higher educational institutions globally. In this cross-functional role you will be working from Orbund Dhaka Office alongside with our Development and Testing teams.
Job Description:
In this position you are expected to have impeccable English writing skills with a passion to learn about new technologies. The day to day activity of a technical writer would primarily include making simple to understand Help and Support materials for Orbund's highly complex SaaS application suit and responding to business proposals for international clients. No prior experience is required as long as you have great writing skills and a problem solving attitude.
Responsibility:
Prepare user guides, release notes and reference documentation
Interact with users of the system and develop innovative video tutorials
Explain complex technical issues via emails, blog posts, FAQs, video scripts, etc.
Prepare responses to RFPs and other business proposals
Communicate user feedback to programmers to help design a better product
Requirements:
Excellent communication skills in both verbal and written English
Creative and analytical writing skills
Strong computer skills and eagerness to learn new technologies
Attention to details and a drive for quality
Bachelor’s in CS/CSE/ETE/EEE or similar fields preferred
Experience Requirements: 0 - 3
No. of Vacancies: 2
Location: Mohammadpur, Dhaka
Salary: BDT 25,000-30,000 
Working Hour: Monday-Friday 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Others facilities: Free Lunch, Tea/Coffee, Annual Retreat
Salary Review: Yearly
Festival Bonus: 2 (Yearly)
If you believe you are the right candidate, then Apply before November 30, 2019.
Application Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeGdTfwI9RzYmJLBU-Re9n7EFXUm0DjCc0FU1oV8W4dLho3ig/viewform

Author: Kamrun Naher
Text:
** Freshers don't need to apply.
Job Description:
.
IDARE is currently seeking to hire a UI/UX designer with Front-End development speciality to support our work onsite and support our clients. The ideal candidate has a thorough understanding of UI/UX as well as general web development standards and best practices. Strong front-end Javascript skills, an eye for design, organizational skills and adaptability are crucial to success in this position.
.
About IDARE
IDARE is a Houston based web software technology start-up, focused on building a scalable web application in the Oil & Gas industry.
.
Responsibilities:
- Design interactive and eye-soothing UI designs using Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator or any other tools.
- Create ideas/ designs using grid-based and UX standards.
- Convert/Implement interactive and responsive web front-end based on the UI designs.
- Developing web user interface components and implementing with popular frontend web UI technologies such as: Vue/React/Angular etc.
- Develop a flexible and well-structured front-end architecture, along with the APIs to support it
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
- Web based plotting such as D3JS, Plotly, Dash and Dashboard creation experience is a plus but optional.
- Test all new and existing sites for performance, scalability and browser compatibility
- Experience in manipulating data, REST API, and JSON
.
.
Required Skills:
- 3-5 years of experience in creating extraordinary, eye-soothing UI designs
- Experience in VueJS/ReactJS and Javascript based development
- Experience in UI implementation for single page website, mobile optimized site and responsive site for any kind of devices
- Strong proficiency in core JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
- Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3, LESS and SASS/SCSS
- Experience converting visual designs into clean, commented, valid templates
- Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
- Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
- Experienced with Git
- Should be a clear communicator, a self-starter, a self-motivator, an open collaborator and deadline-oriented
.
Salary: 50K to 65K BDT,
.
Please email your resume at kchowdhury@idare.io and keep osharif@idare.io in CC. Please include “UI/UX designer with Front-End development speciality” in your subject.

Text:

Author: IDARE
Text:
Twisker is hiring Product Designer
**Who You Are
• You're a generalist with a sweet spot, or a specialist looking to broaden your skills.
• You focus on UI or UX. We're interested in skilled designers with first, titles a distant second.
• You're an amazing craftsperson. Your portfolio, based on 3+ years of experience in design, displays quality examples and inspiring projects that tackle interaction design problems.
• You believe in craftsmanship and create elegant and compelling designs, over and over.
• Your portfolio has some best-in-class work. You're a walking encyclopedia of microinteractions in use (on mobile, web, desktop, etc), and have nuanced views on how to make many of them even better.
• Cross-platform is your style.
• You know what translates from desktop and what doesn't, or why you'd opt for one solution for iOS and another on Android.
• You've shipped product.
• You've weathered release cycles and know what details matter at each stage, how to motivate engineers to get the fit and finish right, how to translate insights from user studies into meaningful action, and what's most likely to go afoul at each stage.
• Prototyping is a key part of your toolset
• You've prototyped on multiple platforms. You've made last-minute tweaks between user studies. You know how to be speedy and resourceful, but dream of better prototyping tools.
Requirements
• Comfortable with cross-functional collaboration between Research, Design, Product, Eng, Data Science and Marketing
• Understands how to translate research insights into actionable design
• Demonstrates an understanding of service design/systems thinking and integrating products/services across a platform
Job Location
• Remote ( 2 days in Co-sharing office space located Gulshan among 5 working days)
Salary Range
• 30,000-100,000+ BDT (Based on skill & experience)
Other Benefits
• Very attractive salary for the deserving candidates.
• Good opportunity for career progression.
• Weekly two day-offs.
• Opportunity to work with foreign clients.
Application Deadline: February 10, 2020
Interested designers can drop your CV to jobs@twisker.io

Job opportunity
Position: Mid-level React Native mobile application developer
Company: GeekPicker
Number of vacancies: 02
Requirements:
• Practical and project based coding experience.
• Should have at least one or more apps in App-store and Play-store.
• B.Sc. in CSE or IT background is preferred.
• Good communication skills in English.
• Able to work remotely if needed.

• Must have strong knowledge of IOS and android SDK.
• Have basic knowledge of java, swift/objective-C objective oriented programing language

• Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality.

We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms. You will be responsible for architecting and building mobile applications, as well as coordinating with the teams responsible for other layers of the product infrastructure. Building a product is a highly collaborative effort, and as such, a strong team player with a commitment to perfection is required. Responsibilities Build pixel - perfect, buttery smooth UIs across both mobile platforms. Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms. Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.

Author: Ferdous Mahmud Shaon
Text:
UI/UX Designer Needed
Who We Are?
MTS Connections Limited is a fin-tech startup company. We stand for making all things finance more simple, accessible and transparent.
Who Are We Looking For?
We’re looking for a talented UI/UX Designer with strong skills in User-Centred Design, Visual Design, Interaction Design, and Usability. A designer with sharp intuition who’s comfortable talking about design as it relates to the needs of the business.
UI/UX Designer responsibilities include designing fully-functional products based on product specifications. To be successful in this role, you should have an eye for color and shape and be able to translate requirements into practical product features.
Ultimately, you will help us build products that are easy to use and visually appealing to our potential customers.
What Will Be Your Responsibilities?
- Analyze how a new feature ties in with market needs and consumer preferences.
- You can think through user problems, find reasonable solutions, mock them up in detail, and work with developers to build them.
- Work closely with developers, product management, and operations to stay on schedule.
- Research materials and techniques.
- Stay up-to-date with design trends and industry standards.
- Strong aesthetic skills with the ability to combine various colors, fonts, and layouts.
- Ability to meet deadlines while working with the team.
What Are We Looking For?
- Proven work experience as UI/UX Designer or similar role.
- A portfolio that showcases your proficiency.
- Clearly communicate and present design decisions with solid rationale, user research, and data.
- Any track record of user-centered design is a plus.
- You know your way around Figma, Sketch or Adobe Creative Suite like the back of your hand.
- Organized, self-directed, efficient and able to manage multiple complex projects on time with strong attention to detail.
- Excellent eye and visual taste.
- Time-management and team collaboration skills.
- Adaptability with the fast-paced startup culture.
Educational requirements
- Talented, creative and potential candidates from any background of work with a proven track record.
Additional requirements
- Age 25 - 35 years.
- The candidate should be proactive, creative, energetic and confident.
- Ability to work under pressure.
- Both males and females are allowed to apply.
Experience
-At least 2 years of professional experience in this field.
Job Type
-Full time

Job Location
-Nikunja-2, Khilkhet, Dhaka-1229

-10:30 AM - 6:30 PM

We, KONA Software Lab Limited
• We provide complete technology behind Nagad, NexusPay in Bangladesh • We conceptualized, designed and developed a core of KonaCard - fastest growing Local Currency in South Korea. • We are now rolling out in Laos (ticketing), in Vietnam (blockchain) from Bangladesh • Each of our live systems supports more than 2 million users and 200K transactions per day,
By joining us as an SQA Engineer, you will not only become a part of such megaprojects but also can set up a role model for your fellow colleagues.
You must have experience of performance test with JMeter.
We do not offer the highest salary in Bangladesh, we do not provide the coolest selfies in Bangladesh, but we offer one of the most challenging and learning software engineering careers in Bangladesh.
We respect and value our colleagues. We listen to them and welcome them to improve our environment in every possible way.
Salary Range: 50K~80K (depends on experience level)
Apply Instructions:

SQA_CandidateName_YearOFexperience i.e SQA_Adnan_3

Author: Mohammad Al Omayer
Text:
"We are hiring"
শব্দটা প্রতিদিনই ২-৪ বার করে দেখি এই গ্রুপে। এই পরজন্ত ১৫০-২০০ বার দেখে ফেলছি। বড় ছোট অনেকেই রিক্রুট করতেছে। অনেক অনেক জবের অনেক অনেক ধরনের "requirement and experince". মজার বিষয় হচ্ছে এক্টা জবের পোস্টের সাথেও আমার মিলে না। প্রতিদিন তাকিয়ে তাকিয়ে দেখি। কিন্তু apply করতে পারিনা। ভুল সময়ে ভুল অফিসে ঢুকে পরছিলাম। কারন চাকরি এক্টা প্রয়োজন ছিলো খুব। আজ আমার চারিদিক বন্ধ। সবার প্রতি অনুরোধ রইলো জব এপ্লাই করার আগে দেখে নিয়েন, চাকরিটার জন্যে আবেদন করতেছেন সেই চাকরিটা যাদি আপ্নি পেয়ে যান তাহলে তারা কি নিয়ে কাজ করে এবং কি প্ল্যাটফরম এ কাজ করে কি technology নিয়ে কাজ করে শুধু তাই না এটা "one man army" নাকি। এসব কিছু নিয়ে হিসেব করেই join করেন তা না হলে আমার মতো আপ্নারো future অন্ধকার লিখে রাখেন।
আসলে চলার মতো টাকা তো কামানই যায়, কনো চাকরি থেকে। কিন্তু দিন শেষে দেখবেন বরতমানের technology থেকে অনেক দুরে সরে না যান।

1

We are looking for programmers with a keen eye for design for the position of Front End Developer. Front end Developers are responsible for ensuring the alignment of web design and user experience requirements, optimizing web pages for maximum efficiency and maintaining brand consistency across all web pages, among other duties.
Front End Developers are required to work in teams alongside Back end Developers, Graphic Designers, and User Experience Designers to ensure all elements of web creation are consistent. This requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Front End Developer Responsibilities:

Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones.

Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design.

Degree in Computer Science or related field.

Author: Touhid Sultan
Text:
Company: AGenCy Lab, IUB (Artificial Intelligence and Cybernetics Lab)  [formerly Computer Vision and Cybernetics Lab http://www.cvcrbd.org/ ]

Vacancy: 4-6

Job Responsibilities:
RAs will be working on projects (topics are given below) with the aim to publish papers in top conferences and Journals. Currently, we have faculty members from both CS and Physics who will be supervising you. The focus will be to rigorously learn and apply statistical and mathematical data analysis as well as deep learning methods. So if you are interested in mathematical modeling and data analysis this might be a good fit for you. Topics:
* Deep learning based Human Activity Recognition from sensor and depth camera
* Land Cover and Land Use detection from semantic segmentation of Satellite data
* Bangla NLP (Machine Translation and Opinion Mining) and Bangla language learning software design
* Information theoretic and causal feature selection for classification.
* Geometric Deep Learning
* ML applications in Astro, Particle, and Plasma physics.
* Swarm robotics etc.

Skills
* Understanding algorithms
* Expertise in Python / Matlab / R
* Familiarity with code versioning tools (Git).
* Linear algebra / Statistics
* Numerical Analysis / Simulation and modeling of natural processes.
* Tensorflow / Pytorch

Employment Status: Full-time / Part-time

Educational Requirements
* Undergraduate in CSE/EEE with proper background in mathematics and programming. We are interested in students who instead of working in a software firm, want to prepare for the GRE and to enrich their research portfolio before applying to a PhD program abroad.

Salary
* The full-time RA salary will be 40K/month (Subject to government taxes) and flexible working hours that can be discussed once you are selected.
* Part-time positions are also available for fourth year undergraduate students or graduates

If you are interested, send me your resume to zshujon@gmail.com by January 17. 

In your resume you should mention your skills as a programmer (in python, matlab, R) and grades in Linear algebra/Statistics/Mathematics for CS/AI/ML courses and provide links to AI/ML projects that you have done. We might conduct an informal interview shortly after the deadline. Hired RAs should start working as soon as possible. If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact me.

for more about projects visit:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/15911htbvDqwhtGULmbCA0X70xSWHSEW8NL1egUELLyI/edit?ts=5e156646

#ekShop offering technical Internship (web,android) for Academic/ Non-academic

# CV Sending Procedure:
===================
• Write in Email Subject ‘ “Resume for Technical Internship”+” (YourName)” ‘ to sohell.ranaa@ekshop.gov.bd
Example: Resume for Technical Internship (Faizul Islam) and send it to ‘sohell.ranaa@ekshop.gov.bd’

# Further Information:
====================
• Internship period 3 (Three) months
• In the internship period, you need to have your own device (Laptop, Mobile etc.)

# What Qualification you need for this:
Passion to learn (We will see how you use web search, stack overflow etc...)
On hand basics on PHP(Laravel) for web (Also having basics on android is necessary in this case)
Workable understanding and experience on http(s) protocol, API (json), CSS, JS, JQuery & GIT tool.
A good design skill is a must

Databases: Understanding on MySQL/MariaDB for web, SQLite & firebase for android.
Remember, you will have to work on projects, so must have some projects done no matter it is for production or academics. We will go through those to understand your skills in the interview session
You have to be a good communicator in English in written and verbally (Be the best is not recommended!)
Office day: 5 Days (Friday, Saturday is a holiday)
Office Entry time 9:30 AM to 5.30 PM

# Benefits: 
=========
• Get a scope to work in a real-life project
• A chance to join the team if you can earn it.
• On successful completion will get Internship Completion Certification

# Location: BDBL Bhaban, Karwan Bazar, Dhaka
# Vacancy: 2
# Joining Date: February, 2020

Note, ekShop is an e-commerce initiative of Access to Information Program (A2I), a whole-of-government program of ICT Division, supported by Cabinet Division and UNDP, that catalyzes citizen-friendly public service innovations simplifying government and bringing it closer to people. It supports the government to be on the forefront of integrating new, whole-of-society approached to achieve the SDGs

WE, KONA Software Lab Limited -

𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘆𝗼𝘂:

- Familiarity with REST API.
- Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle and MongoDB.

Author: Hasnin Momo
Text:
জানিনা এই প্রশ্নটা এখানে করা ঠিক হবে কিনা!!
আমি একজন ডিপ্লোমা ইঞ্জিনিয়ার। বিএসসি ইন সিএসই রানিং, ফাইনাল ইয়ার।
ক্যারিয়ার হিসাবে প্রথমে ওয়েব ডেভেলপমেন্ট নিয়ে শুরু করি অনলাইন মার্কেটপ্লেসে। এরপর আর সেটা কন্টিনিউ করা হয়নি।
একটা কোম্পানিতে সাব-এসিস্ট্যান্ট ইঞ্জিনিয়ার হিসাবে জয়েন করি। কারন একটা ফিক্সড ইনকামের দরকার ছিল। এরপর মোট ৩ টা কোম্পানিতে আইটি এক্সিকিউটিভ/ আইটি অফিসার হিসাবে কাজ করি/এখনো করছি।
অভিজ্ঞতা ৩বছর+ কিন্তু সে হিসাবে স্যালারি খুব একটা ইনক্রিমেন্ট হয়নি।
অন্যদিকে ওয়েব ডেভেলপমেন্টের উপর ভালোবাসাটা রয়েই গেছে৷ এখন আবার প্রাক্টিস শুরু করেছি। কিন্তু এখন যদি কোন প্রফেশনাল লেভেলে কাজ শিখি এরপর হয়তো কোন কোম্পানিতে জয়েন করতে হলে ফ্রেশার হিসাবে জয়েন করতে হবে। কারন পূর্বভিজ্ঞতা নেই।
অন্যদিকে আমার আইটিতে ৩ বছর+ এক্সপ্রিয়েন্স কিন্তু স্যালারি খুব বেশি না। হয়তো কয়েকটা ভেন্ডর সার্টিফিকেট পেলে স্যালারি বাড়তে পারে। কিন্তু আমার ওয়েব প্রোগ্রামিং ভালো লাগে।
আমি কনফিউজড কোনদিকে ক্যারিয়ার গড়া উচিৎ। কেউ যদি কাউন্সিলিং করতেন তাহলে দিকনির্দেশনা পেতাম। আর আমি যেহেতু পেশাজীবি তাই আমার স্যালারির বিষয়টাও ভাবতে হয়।
ওয়েব প্রোগ্রামিং এ স্যালারি বেশি নাকি নেটওয়ার্কিং সেক্টরে???

Author: Mohammad Zakir Hossan
Text:
ULKA GAMES LIMITED: 

Address: 2nd Floor, H# 232/A, R#16, Mohakhali DOHS.

Website: https://ulka.games

About Us:
Full service Game Studio focusing on Card & Board Games for South Asia. 
Our Flagship Game Adda ( http://bit.ly/Addaplay) is one of fastest organically growing game in this segment. 
Par of Moonfrog Labs, South Asia's top Game studio.

Job Description: 
You will work with our current team to develop new features in ADDA. We have few different tracks of work. Depending on your skill & intentions we shall delegate you to the appropriate track. 

Different Tracks:
AI/BOT programming: Experience with creating Card & Board Game agents will be a great plus. Also being a card/board game lover is a plus.
UX Experiments: We run multiple experiments in a week to determine what works best for our players. 
Ad tech & Analytics: Experience with Firebase / Amazon Redshift will be a great plus.
Online Multiplayer: Experience with Photon / Other multiplayer framework will be a great plus.

Benefits:
Learning opportunity: We regularly collaborate with our Moonfrog Team. We have the best Game dev team in South Asia: ranging from Ex Producer of Mafia Wars to FarmVille. 
Portfolio: Apart from Adda: Our developers also work in titles like Ludo Club, Teen Patti Gold among others. Working with us will help you build a global portfolio.
Stable and Profitable Company: (Salary always on time) + Office sponsored Breakfast & Lunch + Office sponsored transportation for if working hours are long on a particular day + Guaranteed Two day weekends or equivalent breaks + Latest 15/16 Inch MacBook Pro and other latest tech. 
Equal Opportunities: We are a flat organisation with no CTO/ Senior/Junior Distinctions. You will be judged 100% on your ability and dedications not by your institution or age.

Salary Range: 
Starting from 30K+ Per Month. But if you are a deserving candidate we don't have any upper ceiling.

How to Apply:
Easy way: If you have a well organised & Updated LinkedIn Profile, please email at zamil@ulka.games with a short cover letter and LinkedIn Profile link.
Hard Way: If you don't have a great LinkedIn Profile: You can send your CV & Cover Letter to the above mentioned Email ID.

What we expect in the Cover Letter:
Which track(s) interests you & why
The work(s) you are most proud of and why.
Two ideas of what you will do to improve Adda.
Your availability/ Potential Joining Date

Selection Process:
(a) Shortlisted candidates will face initial interview.
(b) Final candidate(s) may be called for another round of interview with Bangalore Team
(c) Three Months Probation period: You will receive full salary amount: The only difference is that the notice period is 1 Month in Probation period instead of 2 months for full timers.
(d) Confirmation: After successfully completing probation period you will be a full time member. 

For any further queries/suggestions you can knock me.

Thank you!

Author: Al Mamun
Text:
Are you a tech-savvy person with good communication skills? Does learning about technology keeps you intrigued? If so, there’s an 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩 program on “𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐭” at CodeSmith Tech, which might be the perfect opportunity that you’re looking for.
Role
------------------------------------
Intern- Business Analyst
Compensation: Conditional
Working Hours: 9 AM – 6 PM
Nature: Full-time
Why CodeSmith?
-------------------------------------
At CodeSmith, we strive to think differently. We work in self-sufficient, autonomous teams, learning from each other. It’s a growth-oriented environment with a whole lot of 𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐑𝐍𝐈𝐍𝐆!! It’s a small family where everyone belongs and pushes each other to be better every day. If freedom, spontaneity, and head-scratching challenges rock your world, CodeSmith Tech is the place to be.
What you’ll learn?
-------------------------------------
Being an “𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧- 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐭”, you’ll learn the aspects of working with clients and stakeholders, managing project and product development phases, requirement collection and converting to documentation, ensuring quality assurance as per the definition of done, etc. Your success will expand the growth of your career as well as creating an impact for the company through your contribution.
Education
------------------------------------
B.Sc. in CSE/ETE/EEE or IT background is preferred.
Requirements
------------------------------------
To be eligible for this opportunity, we’re looking for:
• Knowledge of IT and Software systems in general.
• Good written and verbal communication skills.
• Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.
• Excellent critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
• Experience with Microsoft Office Suite.
Interested?
---------------
If reading this excites you, 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲 𝐧𝐨𝐰 at 𝐡𝐭𝐭𝐩𝐬://𝐰𝐰𝐰.𝐜𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐡𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡.𝐜𝐨𝐦/𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲/.
Please select the position of “𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧- 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐭” from the dropdown option and send your updated CV with a cover letter. 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐃𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐞: 15 January, 2020.

Author: Md.Sheikh Farid Milon
Text:
#খুলনায় অবস্থিত স্টার্টআপ সফটওয়্যার ফার্ম এর জন্য  ২ জন করে #সিনিয়র ও #জুনিয়র #লারাভেল ডেভেলপার প্রয়োজন।

ফার্মের নামঃ Appstick
অবস্থানঃ সোনাডাঙ্গা আবাসিক এলাকা, খুলনা।

জুনিয়র পোস্টের রিকুয়ারমেন্টসঃ
* ক্লিন এবং এফিশিয়েন্ট কোড লেখার ক্ষমতা।
* বিজনেস রিকুয়ারমেন্ট এনালাইসিস করা।
* সফটওয়্যার ডেভেলপমেন্ট লাইফ-সাইকেলের প্রতিটা স্টেপ দেখভাল করা।
* ফ্রন্টএন্ড, OOP, MVC, PHP এর উপর জ্ঞান থাকা।
* SQL ও ভার্সন কন্ট্রোলিং এর উপরে ভালো ধারণা থাকা।
* প্রতিদিন স্ট্যাটাস রিপোর্ট দেওয়া এবং প্রয়োজনমত মিটিং সেশনে অংশ নেওয়া।
সিনিয়র পোস্টের রিকুয়ারমেন্টসঃ
উপরের(জুনিয়র) গুলি সহ প্রোজেক্টের জন্য টীম গঠন ও মেইন্টেইন করা, রিকুয়ারমেন্ট অনুযায়ী সফটওয়্যার ডিজাইন করা।

অভিজ্ঞতাঃ
জুনিয়র পোস্টের জন্যে ১ বছর ও সিনিয়র পোস্টের জন্য ২ বছর।

স্যালারি রেঞ্জঃ
দক্ষতা অনুযায়ী জুনিয়র পোস্টে ১২-১৮ হাজার, সিনিয়র পোস্টে ২০-৩০ হাজার।

কাজের সময়ঃ সোমবার থেকে শনিবার, সকাল ১০টা থেকে সন্ধ্যে ৭টা।

সুবিধাসমূহঃ
* প্রতি বছর স্যালারি রিভিউ
* চা-নাশতা।
* লাঞ্চের ব্যবস্থা ( আংশিক খরচ ফার্ম বহন করবে )
* বছরে দুইটা ফেস্টিভাল বোনাস।

এপ্লাই করার জন্যঃ CV মেইল করুন info@appstick.com.bd ঠিকানায়।
মেইলের সাবজেক্টঃ সিনিয়র পোস্টের জন্য "Senior Laravel Developer", জুনিয়র পোস্টের জন্য "Junior Laravel Developer"।

#নোটঃ স্যালারি রেঞ্জ দেখে অনেকের পছন্দ হবেনা, কিন্তু খেয়াল করে দেখুন এটা খুলনায় অবস্থিত ফার্ম, ঢাকা নয়। সুতরাং সেই স্কেলে স্যালারি অফার করা হয়েছে। খুলনায় অবস্থিত অন্যান্য সফটওয়্যার ফার্মের সাথে তুলনা করে দেখতে পারেন।
ঢাকার তুলনায় খুলনার খরচ অনেক অনেক কম।
সুতরাং লোকেশন খেয়াল না করে অযথাই মজা না নেওয়ার অনুরোধ রইলো।
ধন্যবাদ।

Author: Jashim Ahmed Jay
Text:
***FRESHERS DO NOT NEED TO APPLY****
Spring Rain Ltd, IT wing of a USA based multinational company, due to exponential growth are looking to on board a Business Analyst here in our Dhaka (Gulshan-01) office to work closely with senior managers and internal product owners to help deliver the targets and road map.

Job Responsibilities
Identify, agree and manage project scope, objectives and deliverable.
Manage and regularly improve detailed project plans to track progress
Meet deadlines
Liaise with and provide direction to key stakeholders in all projects including engineers, developers, infrastructure projects team, internal management and key customers
Act as the central point of contact between the Software, Support and Management
Manage stakeholder expectations
Implement and maintain clear communication and reporting mechanisms across project, staff, teams and management
Identify and manage the resolution of all project issues, including effective escalation and communication as required
Produce and maintain accurate up to date project plans at the appropriate levels, covering project schedules/timelines, deliverables, budget and resourcing
Maintain compliance throughout projects and ensure safety regulations are adhered to for all development

Educational Requirements
Bachelor degree in CSE/IT
EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS
At least 2 year(s)
SALARY
TK.40000 - 60000 (Monthly)
Eid Bonus 50% of Gross. Timely payment.
COMPENSATION & OTHER BENEFITS
Weekly 2 holidays, Over time allowance
Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize

Author: Infinity lab Engineering Service
Text:
Job Description
Bongo is looking to add new team members to our R&D department. We focus on building online video platforms similar to NetFlix. Some exciting products we have built the technology for are Bongo Solutions and Bioscopelive.
Bongo is looking for experienced PHP Engineers at Mid, Senior & Lead level positions who are motivated to build high performance, robust applications. Primary focus will entail developing web applications and APIs to power service for millions of users. You will work with both front-end and devop engineers to build world class applications that offer engaging features and run smoothly. You will also be optimizing and testing, taking an active role to ensure that the backend services are maintainable and extendable for future development.
Job Responsibility:
Design and develop backend web application features and API modules using PHP and Symfony.
Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments, and clear code
Understand complex concepts and quick prototyping
Be self-driven to learn, push new ideas, and mentor others
Work both independently and on a team
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s or master’s in computer information systems or computer science, or equivalent experience working with web technologies
2+ years Hands-on experience with PHP and Symfony web framework
Knowledge of web technologies (HTTP, Rest, HTML5, etc.)
Experience designing and implementing Restful APIs, GraphQL, and dependency injection.
A strong background with open source and Linux environments
Experience with SQL and database design, specifically MySQL (experience with other storage technologies is also a plus)
Proven software development and web application experience
Experience with Test Driven Development using tools
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Strong problem solving skills
Job Nature: Full-Time
Office Hours: 8 Working Hours Sunday - Thursday. In addition, one Saturday a month is used for a company wide ‘townhall’ for knowledge sharing, announcements, and department updates. This is usually a half day event and includes lunch.
Salary Range: This is negotiable on both sides based on your experience, interview, and references. Our job requirements are clear and we want to properly compensate those who have acquired the required skills.
Benefits/Perks: Festival Bonuses (2) and subsidized lunches.
Flexible work schedule: We recognize that your personal commitments don’t end when you start work for the day. We offer flexible arrangements depending on job responsibilities, generous paid time off — both to ensure that employees can arrange their workdays for maximum productivity and to allow ample time for tending to family and personal responsibilities.

13. Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST)
14. Experience of development using web technologies
15. Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Angular Js/ Vue Js.
16. Hands-on experience on publishing app in Google play store is a must
# Qualifications:
=============
1. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Electrical Engineering, Management Information Systems, or similar technical field
2. Minimum 2-3.5 years of working experience with Android App development is a must
3. Talent and quick learner freshers with basic knowledge of application testing procedure are also welcome to send their CV

Author: B M Jubair Kabir
Text:
We are hiring some technical content writers
Here at StorePress we focus on building Most Popular WordPress Plugins, like WooCommerce Variation Swatches, WooCommerce Variation Gallery, Add to Cart Redirect for WooCommerce and more are launching soon.

As our WordPress plugins are doing really well and we’ve got others in the works, we are growing our team and are looking for some content writers to keep our plugin users engaged in our site writing tutorials, reviews, documentation, tips and tricks.

WHAT WE OFFER:

Competitive salary, based on your experience, skill set;
We only work 5 days/week (From Sunday To Thursday);
A great and inspiring group of people to work with;
Lots of vacation time. Two weeks for Eid-ul-Fitr and Eid-ul-Adha
Annual Tour.
Performance bonus.
Increment: Yearly.
Festival Bonus: 2 (Yearly)
Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize.
Unlimited Tea, Coffee & Snacks.
Work with a vibrant team and amazing products.
Training and learning materials to improve skills.
Learning opportunity.
Friendly and WorldClass work environment

PRIME JOB REQUIREMENT:

You have the ability to research and understand technical concepts and then explain them in simple terms to people who aren’t tech-savvy.
You’re a self-starter who loves taking initiative to solve problems and learn new skills, and are comfortable working with minimal direction.
You have experience writing about WordPress-related topics, such as reviews and tutorials. (would be given first priority)
You’re comfortable with writing and formatting posts and pages, changing post status and scheduling posts, installing and configuring plugins, basic WordPress troubleshooting, etc.
Writing and Editing: You can write a well-structured article with impeccable grammar and spelling in a conversational blog-style tone. You can edit your own work to eliminate careless errors instead of relying on an editor to fix them for you.
You have experience researching online and know how to evaluate the reliability and suitability of your sources.
You can efficiently take screenshots; resize and crop images; add text, borders, or other elements; compress images; and upload and format them in WordPress so that they are clear, useful, and look good.
You understand what SEO is and why it’s important. You know how to research keyword volume and search intent and how to effectively use keywords in your content without keyword stuffing.
You can use the text editor in WordPress to add links and do basic formatting of lists, subheadings, etc. with HTML.

BONUS REQUIREMENT (BUT NOT REQUIRED)

You understand copywriting basics and have experience writing copy that’s proven to convert (like landing pages, sales letters, case studies, marketing emails, etc.)
You have proven results writing email copy. You have experience using Sendy.
You know how to evaluate the effectiveness of your content using Google Analytics.
You have a portfolio of professional-looking web graphics such as blog post featured images, infographics, data visualization, etc.

JOB RESPONSIBILITY
Write and edit blog posts that are engaging, actionable, error-free, and follow our style guide.
See assignments through completion from conception and research to publishing.
Make requested edits without expressing frustration or irritation with the editorial process.
Do keyword research to identify target keywords and use your research to plan, structure, and write the content.
Proactively self-manage and prioritize your workload to keep the content calendar on schedule with minimal oversight.
Monitor SEO rankings and optimize previous posts to boost traffic and conversions.
Work with the developers to write new feature announcements.
Write email newsletters and send them using Sendy.
Proactively provide creative input in discussions and collaborate towards a higher quality finished product or better idea.
Proactively communicate so effectively that other involved team members never wonder what the status is on your activities.

WORKING HOUR

8 AM - 5 PM (From Saturday To Thursday)

LOCATION

Mirpur DOHS

SALARY

20,000 to 35,000 BDT

HOW TO APPLY

Prepare your CV and send us an email at contact@storepress.com with more details about yourself, your CV and/or portfolio related to above.
We look forward to getting in touch!

At least 6+ years of experience in software development including solution or technical architecture experience
Experience in software development and coding in various languages, Java[Android] is a must
Excellent knowledge of software and application design and architecture
Excellent knowledge of UML and other modeling methods
Excellent knowledge of API design and implementation
Understanding of software quality assurance principles
A technical mindset with great attention to detail
Outstanding communication and presentation abilities
Strong analytical and quantitative problem solving ability
Very good skills in OOP and OOD
Knowledge of C++/object oriented program and open source technologies
Familiarity with HTML/CSS, JavaScript and UI/UX design
Proficiency in professional communication in English is a must
Must have mindset to follow the defined development process

Author: Bukhari Sabbir
Text:
weDevs is looking for smart, creative React Native/Flutter Software Engineers to join our product development agency. You’ll be a valued, a core member of our team and help build cutting-edge mobile and web applications for our clients.
We want developers who understand mobile application development with React Native/Flutter. You should be comfortable linking native mobile SDKs. Bonus points if you can write a native SDK bridge. Be comfortable making changes directly in XCode and Android Studio when needed.
If you enjoy challenges, working on interesting projects and want to take your development skills to the next level, then come join our team.
WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR
Experience working with Swift, Objective C, and Java a plus but not required.
Meaningful experience working on large, complex systems.
Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon, both in regards to estimates and to general process.
Ability to identify with the goals of Full Stack clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them.
An understanding of React Native/Flutter best practices and a commitment to following them.
Ability to work through new and difficult React Native/Flutter issues and contribute to libraries as needed.
Ability to create and maintain continuous integration and delivery of React Native applications.
A positive mindset and can-do attitude.
Forensic attention to detail.
English Skills (ability to effectively communicate via written and spoken English).
You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.
You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your colleagues.
Hard worker and passionate – we are growing super FAST 😉
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION
It doesn`t matter where you went to college or what your CGPA was as long as you are smart, passionate, ready to work hard and have fun.
WORKING HOURS:
8 AM – 5 PM
WORKING DAYS:
Weekly: 5 days.
Weekend: Saturday, Sunday.
SALARY
TK. 30000 – 50000 (Monthly)
BENEFITS YOU’LL GET:
Provident fund, Gratuity.
Performance bonus.
Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize.
Unlimited Tea, Coffee & Snacks.
Yearly tour.
Work with a vibrant team and amazing products.
Training and learning materials to improve skills.
Learning opportunity.

Author: Gausul Majid Mamun
Text:
Job Title: Customer Profile Management (CPM) Officer
Website: https://orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 1
Company Name: Orbund LLC
Company Introduction
Founded in 2003, Orbund is a student information system (SIS) provider to postsecondary education. Headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas, the company serves a wide range of non-profit and proprietary institutions in North America and abroad.
Orbund’s SIS technology answers higher education calls for a true, cloud-based, configurable system. Einstein and Edison SIS products are Software-as-a-Service solutions. The architecture features configuration for small schools or multi-campus colleges offering ground-based, online, and blended academic programs.
Job Responsibility
Responsible for project management of assigned client accounts ensuring that projects meet timelines and that all specifications of the project are fulfilled.
The Customer Profile Management (CPM) Officer is responsible for establishing, coordinating, and assisting the VP of Client Service & VP of Technology involved with their clients.
The CPM utilizes Project Management methodologies and interpersonal skills in all phases of medium to high complexity projects.
Manage client accounts and projects as assigned ensuring clients are successfully engaged in Orbund systems and processes.
The CPM is responsible for the following Knowledge areas of each Project: Integration, Scope, Time, Cost, Quality, Communications, Risk, and Procurement.
Responsibility also extends to establishing project schedule, communicating effectively to all stakeholders, maintaining a centralized file of key milestones and historical information.
Accurately assemble, analyze and report metrics weekly around client service, quality and communication, both internally and externally.
The CPM is responsible for monitoring and closing out assigned projects. Develops client relationships and raises the profile of key clients within the organization.
The Customer Profile Management Officer will work with QA, Developer, Client Service,  Sales and Marketing team to ensure a seamless service across the account.
Should have the ability to work at night time with US staff. Then the working schedule will be different for you based on discussion.
Job Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
Certification in Project Management (PMP) will get preference.
Experience in Jira, FreshDesk, Zendesk or similar tools
3-5 years experience in related field.
Experience managing client-facing projects.
Cross-functional team leadership experience.
Solid information management (physical and virtual) skills.
Experience demonstrating excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Effective in dealing directly with clients, operational teams, and commercial colleagues, globally
Excellent Organizational Skills
Ability to Multitask
Language skills are beneficial
Strong Analytical and problem-solving abilities
Excellent information management skills

Author: ReliSource
Text:
Job Title: Implementation Project Manager
Website: https://orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 1
Company Name: Orbund LLC
About Company
Founded in 2003, Orbund is a student information system (SIS) provider to postsecondary education. Headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas, the company serves a wide range of non-profit and proprietary institutions in North America and abroad.
Orbund’s SIS technology answers higher education calls for a true, cloud-based, configurable system. Einstein and Edison SIS products are Software-as-a-Service solutions. The architecture features configuration for small schools or multi-campus colleges offering ground-based, online, and blended academic programs.
About the role:
The Implementation Project Manager will work with our new and existing clients to ensure the successful implementation of our student information systems (SIS) software services. To be successful in the role the Implementation Project Manager should have an expert level of knowledge in both project management methodologies and is adept at quickly analyzing and identifying client business needs. As an Implementation Project Manager, you own everything related to the successful implementation of all Orbund solutions and serve as the primary point of contact for both internal and external stakeholders. Our project managers possess a deep understanding of the client’s business goals and develop strong rapport to effectively create and execute onboarding project plans. As a member of the Professional Services team, you are the first point of contact in our clients’ post-sales experience and are responsible for ensuring an above average level of satisfaction with the onboarding process. Along with managing successful implementation projects, the Implementation Project Manager will meet both team and personal goals as defined by the VP of Technology.
Job Responsibilities:
Conduct client workflow reviews, define the project scope and objectives, ensure all relevant stakeholders are involved in the plan and proactively identify potential issues with the technical feasibility of clients’ requirements
Manage project scope as agreed with the client and ensure that the project plan is fully executed on time and within scope
Create and maintain required project artifacts including project schedule, requirement documents and progress reports
Coordinate all internal and external resources for successful execution of projects
Liaise with the sales team during the Sale-to-Services transition and lead the Services-to-Support transition
Effectively communicate project expectations and progress to our clients, team members and the executive team in a clear and timely manner
Manage the creation and completion of product work orders
Ensure compliance with Orbund specifications and applicable regulatory bodies
Follow the established policies, procedures and workflows outlined for successful implementation
Continually strive to improve project management processes by enhancing best practices and proactively identifying areas of improvement
Embrace change while promoting the Orbund culture and spirit of teamwork
Demonstrate an increasing level of expertise of Orbund products and partner integrations
Contribute to ongoing internal content creation, documentation and audits
Stay informed and understand development release notes and how platform updates will impact product set-up
Should have the ability to work at night time with US staff. Then the working schedule will be different for you based on discussion.
Job Requirements:
3-5 years working experience as a  project manager in software implementation
Familiarity with CRM, project management, support & ticketing software systems (SRP, Salesforce, JIRA, Smartsheets, Microsoft Office and Google Docs)
Proven ability to work in a fast paced, team centered work environment
Excellent communication – verbal, written, interpersonal with strong active listening skills
Ability to demonstrate effective problem solving skills and strong customer orientation
Detail-oriented with a positive and inquisitive attitude
Ability to multitask, prioritize, and collaborate with multiple departments and stakeholders
Exhibit a high degree of self-motivation and drive
Educational Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree or an equivalent combination of training and experience
B.Sc in Computer Science or a related field
Additional Requirements
Honest, ethical, and dependable
Expert stress management skills and ability to make important decisions under pressure
Attentive listener; understanding, empathetic, and personable
Job Location: Mohammadpur, Dhaka
Salary: Negotiable
Working Hour: Monday-Friday 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Other facilities: Free Lunch, Tea/Coffee, Annual Retreat

Author: Esprimi Habib
Text:
Company/ Organization: Raptas Inc.
Job Title: Mobile App Developer (Android and iOS)
Job Context
We are looking for passionate Mobile app Developer (both Android and iOS) to join our R&D center in Bangladesh. The ideal candidate will be an enthusiastic developer eager to learn and grow his/her skills in the field. We strive to deliver solutions with lasting value, meeting not only the client's expectations but also their unexpressed needs. At Raptas Software, you will own your experience and achieve beyond your perceived potential.
Flexible to work M-F (1:30 pm - 10:30 pm)
Job Responsibilities
· 3+ years of development experience in mobile applications development.
· Design and build applications for the iOS & Android platforms.
· Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
· Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
· Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
· Help maintain code quality, organization, and scalability.
Technical requirements:
· Kotlin (Preferable), Java or Swift
· RxJava/RxSwift
· Dependency injection
· Design Patterns (MVP, MVMM, MVC, Adapter, Façade, etc)
· UI testing
· A/B testing
· Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
· Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
· Experience writing multi-threaded, asynchronous code
· Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding
· Experience with third-party libraries and REST APIs.
· Proficient understanding of code versioning tool GIT
· Shipped one or more non-trivial apps on iOS/Android app stores.
· We are looking for the developer who is expert both in Android and iOS, but expert in one platform and have good knowledge on another platform is also preferable.
Additional Requirements
· Excellent verbal and written English communication skills are must
· Successfully contribute to client-facing software projects by individual effort
· Ability to think out of the box, problem-solving skills
· Regularly meet delivery estimates set by the client
· Work under Pressure, Passion for learning and growth
· Ability to meet the deadline.
· Adapt to new technology quickly.
· Excellent time management and multitasking skills.
· Able to work independently or in a full team.
Employment Status
Full-time
Educational Requirements
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science Engineering
Experience Requirements
At least 3 year(s)
The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):
Mobile apps developer, Software developer
Job Location
Dhaka
Salary
· 50K-100K
· Competitive salary structure.
· Salary commensurate with education & experience.
Compensation & other benefits
· Weekly 2 holidays
· Lunch Facilities: Full Subsidize
· Salary Review: Yearly
· Festival Bonus: 3 (Yearly)
· At Raptas Software, we believe there's a better way and it all starts with our people. We offer a variety of benefits and programs to ensure you love what you do and do what you love.
· 2 Eid Festival bonus and Boishakhi bonus
· Lunch and evening snacks
· Birthday celebration bonus
· The best employee of the year will be rewarded with travel abroad.
Read Before Apply
1. Please list out your Portfolio / Blog / Github / Bit Bucket /Stack Overflow / Linked ln account link in the email body. 
2. Please mention "Mobile App Developer" in the email subject line. 
3. rename your resume file in NAME_UNIVERSITY_YEAR-OF-EXPERIENCE.pdf format (example: habib_KUET_4.5.pdf ). 
4. Mentioning the current and expected salary is recommended. 
 
Please don't apply if your skills and experience do not match our criteria.
*Photograph must be enclosed with the resume.
Apply Procedure
Send your CV to jobs@raptasoft.com

Author: Elma Sultana Tithi
Text:
Company/Organization
Monstar Lab Bangladesh (formerly known as Sekai Lab Bangladesh) is a Japan based software development platform providing software solutions to all over the world. Monstar
Lab is all about product development. We are a trusted partner who connects corporations
with the skilled, affordable Asian software engineer teams and firms.
Number of Vacancies
15-20
Job Description
We are looking for engineers (Freshers are encouraged to apply) who are passionate about programming, willing to
work in any technology stack, quick learner, eager to welcome challenges and good in
communication to join us in the position of Junior Software Engineer. You will be a part of
our development team, thus achieving the opportunity to provide solutions for international
market by collaborating with colleagues from all over the world.

Basic Requirements
● Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent (Freshers are encouraged to
 apply)
● Good communication skills in English, both written and spoken
Technical Skills
● Strong problem solving ability and analytical skills
● Good knowledge of at least one programming language
● Clear concept of OOP
● Good knowledge of relational databases, data structures and algorithms
● Basic knowledge of design patterns
● Clear concept of both server side and client side programming
● Familiarity with VCS like git
● Command over software development life-cycle
● Knowledge on cloud based infrastructure
● Hands on experience with Linux based operating systems

 Benefits
● Great Compensation Package
● Awesome Career Growth
● Festival bonuses with 2 Full gross salary
● Conveyance allowance BDT 3,500
● Objective based performance driven promotions along with structured career
path and half yearly increment policy
● Opportunity to work abroad with our other branch members
● Opportunity to work with international clients
● Free breakfast, lunch, evening snacks facility
● Allowance for Japanese language ability, taking vendor certifications
● 15 paid leaves, 10 sick leaves, maternity and paternity leave
● Challenging and friendly working environment with talented start-up members
around the world
● Two days weekend holiday ( Saturday & Sunday)
● Monthly team party fund
● Annual Picnic
● Allowance for training

Please send your resume to following email address. Please take your time to prepare your resume and attach a recently taken photo unlike NID. Remember resume is the first impression.

email: recruitment@monstar-lab.com.bd

Author: Thowhidur Rahman
Text:
We are looking for 3 talented People who will NOT develop a website like the attached image ;) Rather be creative and develop WOW websites for our clients.

QUICK SUMMARY:
Job Position: PSD to WordPress Expert
Total Vacancy: 3
Work Station: Banasree (A Block), Rampura, Dhaka.
Working Hour: Sunday - Thursday (10am - 6pm), Saturday (4 hours, Anytime from Home)
Educational Qualification: Degree is not a matter for us but you have to understand English Instruction properly.
Salary: 20000 - 32000 BDT (Depending on your skill and experience)
Preferred Joining Date: January 1, 2020 (If you are free, you can even join from next month)

WHAT YOU NEED TO DO:
It’s Simple. We will give you PSD and you have to convert them into WordPress. Your conversion should be W3C Compliant, Pixel Perfect, Responsive, Easily Editable Backend, Browser Compatible and most importantly, your code should be WordPress Standard. Apart from the knowledge of WordPress, these are the things we require also:
Proper knowledge of PHP, JS, JQuery & Ajax (HTML-CSS Obviously :p )
Strong knowledge on Advanced Custom Fields Pro, Redux/Codestar Framework, WooCommerce & WP Bakery Page Builder.

Few more things to note here:
We don’t expect that you will be an 100% expert of PHP, JS, JQuery & Ajax but you need to have enough knowledge to add any function our client requires on their PSD. You can take help from Google, Stack Overflow, WP Codex, we don’t care as long as you are a quick learner.
If you have knowledge of PSD to Shopify or other CMS, it will be counted as PLUS.
The PSD files will be for our Client’s websites, not for Themeforest based projects.

WHO ARE WE?
We are Psdtowpservice.com (a concern of A-WEB), one of the top ranked websites on Google providing "PSD to WordPress" service. (Just go to Google and search "PSD to WordPress", I am sure you will find us on Top 5 ;) )

WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN OUR TEAM?
Well, we are Good People ;) Here are few of our qualities:
We provide Timely Salary
You can take as much Tea-Coffee you like, Eat as much ‘Biscuits’ you want.
Air Conditioned Workstation
Festival Allowance
BDT 8000 Bonus every two months for the Best Performer
Year End Bonus for the Best Performer
Yearly Increment
1 Plate Kacci Biriyani Offer after completion of each SPECIAL Projects
Sometimes, You may even get a Bhel Puri or Muri Vorta in your table in the evening

WHY YOU SHOULD NOT JOIN OUR TEAM?
Here are our negative sides (we are trying to improve, trust me):
We don’t provide lunch. We have a vendor but you have to pay for it.
Our office is small. We are only 5-6 person at the moment.
Our office is situated in an Apartment. So, if you are looking for an official Space, you will be disappointed. We did few decorations though ;)

HOW TO APPLY?
Please Email us at career@a-web.org . On your email, you have to follow the below rules:

Your subject line should be “I am a PWE”
On Email Body, Write down about 2-3 of your BEST PSD to WordPress project. Please be descriptive: what you did, what were the challenges you faced, how you fixed those challenge, what plugin or theme you used etc. Make sure you send the JPG of the design along with the live website URL so that we can cross check the PIXEL PERFECTION.
Your expected Salary
Your CV (Not Mandatory, but if you can send, it would be better)
If you have experience with PSD to Shopify or other CMS, you can mention about that also.

[PLEASE READ THE ABOVE 5 POINTS AGAIN, YOUR APPLICATION WON’T BE ACCEPTED IF YOU DON’T FOLLOW THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS]

FEW REQUEST:
Please please please apply as per the instructions, don’t send only CV. If you can’t follow a job instruction, how can you follow our client’s instruction, simple :)
This is not a remote job. So, please don’t request.
Please Do not inbox if it’s not really necessary. If you inbox for No reason, we will not count your application.
If you think the salary should be more depending on the requirement, you can surely ignore this post. As we are small company, we simply can't afford more than this. I hope you can understand :)
If you are not a PSD to WordPress Expert but you are better in WordPress Theme or Plugin Customization/Development, you can also apply with relevant work examples. We are also looking for experts in these areas.

Robi Axiata Limited is now receiving applications for one of its subsidiaries in the position of “App Detective (Software QA), Frontend and Backend Application”. The key purpose of the responsible incumbent to design, develop and automate test cases and ensure building and release quality software for backend and frontend streaming OTT application for Small (Mobile device) & Large Screen (Android, Tizen and IOS Television, Computer/Laptops and Tabs).

Core Responsibilities:

Set & execute the testing strategy to meet business objectives
Evaluate, select and implement test automation technologies.

Ensure that the appropriate level of QA automation is integrated in the DevOps pipeline.
Write and maintain end-to-end automated tests using Espresso, Appium, Selenium, Rspec, Protractor, ZAP or other test automation tools.
Perform UI testing, black box, functional, automated regression and performance, security and burn-in testing.
Design and build tools for running tests.
Research solutions for scaling and improving performance.
Work with the rest of the engineering team to identify, troubleshoot and fix bugs.
Identify and execute on opportunities to improve the QA process.
Work with engineering and support to triage inbound bug reports and reproduce reported issues.
Academic Qualifications:

B.Sc./MSC in Information Technology/Computer Science/Engineering from any reputed university.
Experience & Skills required:

Minimum of 2 years working experience with good track record of working in a fast moving and fluid environment.
Hands-on experience in Streaming platform.
Clear understanding on OTT ecosystem.
Clear concept on different streaming communications protocols.
Experience on Responsive, design cross-browser compatibility & other general web functions and standards.
Understanding on enterprise-grade secure Android Mobile application.
Understanding on enterprise-grade secure Android TV application.
Understanding on enterprise-grade secure iOS application.
Understanding on enterprise-grade secure Tizen TV application.
Expertise in test automation and tools/ frameworks (e.g. Cucumber/Gherkin, Espresso, Selenium Grid, Junit, SOAP-UI, Eclipse, Jenkins, Ant, Maven, Visual Studio, JIRA, etc.
Experience in API testing using Postman, JMeter, Katalon Studio, SoapUI, Apigee
Familiarity in one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g. Java/JQuery, Javascript, Python/Jython, Ruby, Groovy, C#, .Net, VBScript, SQL, etc).
Clear understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and related web technologies (Angular, REST etc.).
Exposure to platforms/OS/Servers (e.g. Windows Server, Linux/Unix, J2EE, IIS, Apache, Tomcat, etc.).
Mobile test automation experiences a strong plus (iOS, Android, and mobile web).
Android-related projects on Github, experience with BDD, Cucumber, Jenkins, Git, and Appium
SQL Query, scripting and good understanding of DevOps pipeline.
Clear understanding and experience on OWASP top 10 security issue.

Application Deadline: December 04, 2019

Author: Nazmul Rajon
Text:
চাকুরীঃ
১ জন ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস ডেভেলপার খুঁজছি।
Company Name: TeamExio
Office Location: Eastern Housing LTD, Pallabi 2nd Phase, Dhaka-1216
➡️কেমন ডেভেলপার খুঁজছেন ?
উত্তরঃ ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস ও ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস Page Builders (Elementor, WP Bakery, Divi) সম্পর্কে পরিষ্কার ধারনা। সম্পূর্ণ নিজের করা কমপ্লিট কিছু প্রোজেক্ট। ধৈর্য এবং শেখার আগ্রহ।
➡️ অভিজ্ঞতা কেমন প্রয়োজন ?
উত্তরঃ কমপক্ষে ১ বছর প্রফেসনালি ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস নিয়ে কাজ করার অভিজ্ঞতা ।
➡️বেতন কেমন হবে ?
উত্তরঃ ২৫ হাজার - ৩৫ হাজার (যোগ্যতার উপর)
➡️অফিস টাইম ?
উত্তরঃ সকাল ৯ টা থেকে বিকাল ৫ টা
➡️ কাদের জন্য এই পোস্ট ?
উত্তরঃ ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস ও ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস Page Builders (Elementor, WP Bakery, Divi) সম্পর্কে পরিষ্কার ধারনা। আগে ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস এর জব করেছেন, ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস Page Builders নিয়ে কাজ করেছেন, ভালো ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস জানেন।
➡️যোগদান কবে?
উত্তরঃ পহেলা ডিসেম্বর ।
➡️অন্যান্য সুবিধা কি কি ?
উত্তরঃ পারফরমেন্স বোনাস, ফেস্টিভাল বোনাস, সাপ্তাহিক ছুটি ২ দিন, বাৎসরিক ১৫ দিন ঐচ্ছিক ছুটি, দুপুরের খাবার, চা, কফি, স্ন্যাক্স।
➡️কিভাবে এপ্লাই করবো?
উত্তরঃ এপ্লাই করতে ভিজিট করুনঃ https://teamexio.com/job/wordpress-developer/
আপনাকে “Apply For This Position” বাটনে ক্লিক করে অ্যাপ্লিকেশান ফর্ম পূরণ করে সাবমিট করতে হবে।
বিঃ দ্রঃ এই পোস্ট তাদের জন্য যাদের ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস নিয়ে প্রফেসনালি কাজ করার অভিজ্ঞতা আছে। ওয়ার্ডপ্রেস শিখছেন অথবা ৫-৬ মাস ধরে কাজ করছেন এমন কারো জন্য এই পোস্ট নয়। পোস্ট 'টা শেয়ার অথবা ট্যাগ করতে পারেন, এতে হয়তো কারো উপকার হলেও হতে পারে। অহেতুক কমেন্ট করে সময় নষ্ট না করার জন্য অনুরোধ করা হলো।

Author: Shorifull Islam Ratan
Text:
APPNAP TECHOLOGIES LIMITED is looking for GRAPHIC DESIGNERS.
OFFERED POSITION: UI/UX DESIGNER.
NUMBER OF VACANCIES: 02.
If you are passionate about well-conceived user experiences and beautifully crafted products and want to join the best professionals in creating them - this opportunity is perfect for you! As a product designer, you will be involved in the core process of creating our great products. You will use your artistic and creative skills to create innovative and intuitive user experiences, jaw-dropping, eye-catching interfaces that will free our user's creativity. With bigger and bigger frontiers to conquer, we’re looking for a passionate, bright, and driven UI/UX Designer that is eager to bring our apps to the next level.
A FEW EXAMPLES OF YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES AS AN UI/UX DESIGNER:
• Research, design, and prototype new user experiences based on product requirements both from the product manager and the creative director.
• Deliverables include designing use case & scenarios exploration, wireframes & prototypes, mockups of screens and flows, production of visual assets, and design guides documentation required for proper implementation of the designs.
• Keep consistency of UX & UI behaviour among our products.
• Design and maintain the company and product websites.
• Keep updated on the latest design trends and the newest apps in the market.
• Take ownership of a project from first ink drop to the last pixel implementation.
• Have fun. Take chances. Try new things.
REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS:
• Minimum 2 years working experience in similar field.
• Exceptional digital portfolio.
• Strong fundamentals in design, illustration, typography, color and strong attention to details.
• Affinity for consistency, composition, color use and a keen eye for subtle details.
• Strong attention to details.
• Highly proficient in Illustrator and Photoshop. Familiarity with Sketch, HTML/CSS/JavaScript or AfterEffects - a plus.
• Proven experience working on UX aspects of a product.
• Proven experience in design at an iOS environment from start to finish as a UI designer.
• Bachelor's Degree in Graphic Design, Media Arts, visual communication or similar - a plus.
• Self-starter, self-motivated, ability to work independently.
• Ability to work under pressure and time constraints.
• Strong communication skill in English.
WHAT WE OFFER:
• Huge impact: You’ll be working on products used by hundreds of thousands of people all around the world. The quality of your work will make a decisive difference both to the users and to Appnap.
• Talented, knowledgeable colleagues: You’ll get the chance to learn (and teach too!) some of the brightest and most skilled people you’ll ever meet. Your talent is going to blossom here.
• Own products: We don’t work for clients, but only develop our own apps.
• International reach: Our audience is wildly international. We’re a global reality.
COMPENSATION AND OTHER BENEFITS:
• 02 weekly holidays.
• Excellent working environment.
• Lunch and snacks offered by office.
• Recreation facility (Home theatre and Play Station 4 Pro).
• 02 yearly festival bonuses.
• Performance bonus.
• Yearly salary review.
• Yearly official tour.
• Casual leave, Sick Leave, Annual Leave and public holidays as gazette by the government and organisation’s decision.

SALARY: BDT 35,000 to 70,000.

JOB LOCATION: Ranks Business Center (5th Floor), Ka-218/1, Pragati Sarani, Dhaka - 1229, Bangladesh.

JOB APPLICATION DEADLINE: 5th December 2019

APPLY HERE: https://appnap.io/careers#UI-UX-Designer.

- 20K - 45K based on experienced.

উত্তরঃ সকাল ৯ টা থেকে বিকাল ৫ টা

➡️ কাদের জন্য এই পোস্ট ?
উত্তরঃ Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, PSD to HTML Conversion, Responsive Web Development সম্পর্কে পরিষ্কার ধারনা এবং আগে ফ্রন্টএন্ড এর জব করেছেন ।

➡️যোগদান কবে?
উত্তরঃ পহেলা ডিসেম্বর ।

➡️অন্যান্য সুবিধা কি কি ?
উত্তরঃ পারফরমেন্স বোনাস, ফেস্টিভাল বোনাস, সাপ্তাহিক ছুটি ২ দিন, বাৎসরিক ১৫ দিন ঐচ্ছিক ছুটি, দুপুরের খাবার, চা, কফি, স্ন্যাক্স।

➡️কিভাবে এপ্লাই করবো?
উত্তরঃ এপ্লাই করতে  ভিজিট করুনঃ https://teamexio.com/job/front-end-developer/
আপনাকে “Apply For This Position” বাটনে ক্লিক করে অ্যাপ্লিকেশান ফর্ম পূরণ করে সাবমিট করতে হবে।

বিঃ দ্রঃ এই পোস্ট তাদের জন্য যাদের ফ্রন্টএন্ড নিয়ে প্রফেসনালি  কাজ করার অভিজ্ঞতা আছে।  ফ্রন্টএন্ড শিখছেন অথবা  ৫-৬ মাস ধরে কাজ করছেন এমন কারো জন্য এই পোস্ট নয়।  পোস্ট 'টা শেয়ার অথবা ট্যাগ করতে পারেন, এতে হয়তো কারো উপকার হলেও হতে পারে। অহেতুক কমেন্ট করে সময় নষ্ট না করার জন্য অনুরোধ করা হলো।

Author: Md Wahid Khan Rony
Text:
Looking for Android Developer
Vacancy: 1
Employment Status: Full-time
Salary Range: BDT 30K ~ 40K
Joining Date: As early as possible.
Experience Requirements: At least 2 years
Educational Requirements: B.Sc in Computer Science & Engineering from any reputed university.
Job Location: Banasree, Rampura.
Job Description:
• Translate designs and wire-frames into high quality code *Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable code
• Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
• Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
Requirements:
• At least 2 years of expert programming experience in Java/Kotlin with strong understanding of OOPS concept
• Must be able to demonstrate strong knowledge of Android UI design principles and patterns. Should be proficient with the concepts of dependency injection, architectural and design patterns like RxJava & MVP etc.
• Must have worked on Published app in Google Play (or widely-deployed by other means)
• Should be proficient with multi-threading / asynchronous logic, REST & JSON, android libraries like retrofit, build systems like gradle.
• A solid foundation in computer science, with sound knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and software design is a must
• Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
• Experience with offline storage, threading, performance tuning, Google maps, cloud message APIs, Firebase and push notifications
• Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
• Understanding of Google's Android design principles and interface guidelines
• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
• UI and Unit Testing
*** If you have experience on Dart & Flutter, you will be preferred candidate.
*****PLEASE DON'T APPLY IF YOU ARE NOT AT LEAST TWO YEARS EXPERIENCE*****
**Send your CV to monir@bacbonltd.com before 15 December 2019 and don't forget to mention "Android Developer" in the subject line of the email. **

Author: Milon Hossain
Text:
Job Description:

Bongo is looking to add new team members to our R&D department. We focus on building online video platforms similar to NetFlix. Some exciting products we have built the technology for are Bongo Solutions and Bioscopelive.

Bongo is looking for experienced PHP Engineers at Mid, Senior & Lead level positions who are motivated to build high performant, robust applications. Primary focus will entail developing web applications and APIs to power service for millions of users. You will work with both front-end and devop engineers to build world class applications that offer engaging features and run smoothly. You will also be optimizing and testing, taking an active role to ensure that the backend services are maintainable and extendable for future development.

Job Responsibility:

Design and develop backend web application features and API modules using PHP and Symfony.
Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments, and clear code
Understand complex concepts and quick prototyping
Be self-driven to learn, push new ideas, and mentor others
Work both independently and on a team

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s or master’s in computer information systems or computer science, or equivalent experience working with web technologies
2+ years Hands-on experience with PHP and Symfony web framework
Knowledge of web technologies (HTTP, Rest, HTML5, etc.)
Experience designing and implementing Restful APIs, GraphQL, and dependency injection.
A strong background with open source and Linux environments
Experience with SQL and database design, specifically MySQL (experience with other storage technologies is also a plus)
Proven software development and web application experience
Experience with Test Driven Development using tools
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Strong problem solving skills
Job Location: Baridhara J-Block, Dhaka. Work primarily to be done in office with opportunity for occasional work from home based on performance.

Job Nature: Full-Time

Office Hours: 8 Working Hours Sunday - Thursday. In addition, one Saturday a month is used for a company wide ‘townhall’ for knowledge sharing, announcements, and department updates. This is usually a half day event and includes lunch.

Salary Range: We are hiring mid, senior & lead level engineers salary ranging from 50k to 250k. This is negotiable on both sides based on your experience, interview, and references. Our job requirements are clear and we want to properly compensate those who have acquired the required skills.

Benefits/Perks: Holiday Bonuses (2) and subsidized lunches.

Flexible work schedule: We recognize that your personal commitments don’t end when you start work for the day. We offer flexible arrangements depending on job responsibilities, generous paid time off — both to ensure that employees can arrange their workdays for maximum productivity and to allow ample time for tending to family and personal responsibilities.

Interested people, send your cv to ahmad@bongobd.com
For more details: http://career.bongo-solutions.com.s3-website-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/php-engineer/

Author: Rafian Zaber
Text:
Vacancy : 2
Job Description
We are looking for a Python Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application; therefore, understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
Responsibilities
-Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code
-Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
-Design and implementation of the large scale enterprise end of day risk system
-Implementation of security and data protection
-Integration of data storage solutions
Skills And Qualifications
-At least 4+ years working experience in Python
-Familiarity with ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries
-Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system
-Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture
-Good understanding of server-side templating
-Understanding of accessibility and security compliance
-Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
-Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
-Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
-Understanding of the differences between multiple delivery platforms, such as mobile vs desktop, and optimizing output to match the specific platform
-Able to create database schema that represent and support business processes
- Experience in API development
-Proficient understanding of code versioning tools
Job Nature: Full time.
Job Location: Gulshan-Badda Link Road, Dhaka
Experience Requirements:
- 4+ Years
Salary Range: 50,000+ for suitable candidates
Other Benefits:
- Project Bonus for on time successful project delivery
Please send your updated Resume to parvess1981@gmail.com
