Author: Sakhawat Hossain Kabir
Text:
Employer: Information Engineering Group America
We assume you have a passion for travel as well as interests in innovation and IT technologies. At IEG, we're solving problems that airlines all over the world are facing with talented individuals who share our passion to innovate and think outside the box. Our culture is constant learning, brainstorming, dynamic and creative. Headquartered in the Montreal Area, we work to build an inclusive environment in which everyone, regardless of gender, race, religion, age, or background, can do their best work. Depending on your qualifications and experience, we offer a diverse range of possibilities. If you want to join our winning team send us your resume at a.tahmid@ieg-america.ca. We are looking forward to meeting you.
Start Date: December 2019
Positions:
- QA Lead (80,000BDT) ***Negotiable***
- Experienced QA (40,000BDT) *Negotiable*
Location: This is a remote job. However, if the QA(s) prefer to work from a local office in Dhaka, an office space can be arranged.
Work Hours: 8, Flexible, At least 2 hours common with Montreal time (GMT-5), 5 days a week
Target Applications:
- Windows Desktop (Windows Form, WPF, and UWP)
- Mobile
- Web
Requirements:
- BS/MS in Computer Science/Software Engineering or equivalent
- 2+ years of experience as a QA in a reputed company (4+ for the lead position)
- Fluent in written and spoken English
Responsibilities:
- Setting up a testing environment for automated and manual testing
- Communicate with programmers and product owners to clarify requirements
- Design test plans, scenarios, scripts and procedures
- Execute performance, load and stress tests
- Perform manual UI tests
- Write bugs reports with replication instructions
- Write detailed status reports
- Share ideas toward continuous improvement
- Lead, manage and train the other QAs (for the lead position)
Required Skills:
- Experience in writing unit tests in C#
- Familiar with rational database (SQL/Oracle)
- Knowledge of Source Control (TFS/VSTS)
- Knowledge of JSON, XML, SOAP
- Knowledge of desktop app config files, config keys and endpoint configs
Preferred Skills:
- Capable of reviewing code if needed
- Experience in any bug tracking system (Preference: JIRA)
- Knowledge of API testing tools such as Postman, SoapUI
If this job advertisement interests you, please feel free to send me your resume (with relevant experience only) at a.tahmid@ieg-america.com. Please put the subject as "QA Lead" or "Experienced QA" depending on the position you are interested in. Contact me via email for queries.
Have a good day!
Tahmid

EASCA Solutions Limited is looking for two experienced ASP.NET MVC Full-stack developers for its offshore development team. As an ASP.NET MVC Full-stack / Front-End Engineer, you will be responsible for helping to execute and facilitate the activities within the team in all aspects of software development. This role requires a person who is highly flexible, quick thinking, motivated and excellent team player.

Job Nature: Full Time

Job Location: Uttara, Dhaka

Working Time & Days: 11.00AM to 8.00PM (Sunday to Thursday)

What You Will Do:
- Collaborate with a team of developers through the design, development, enhancement, testing and support of enterprise application using Microsoft technologies, ASP.NET MVC/WebApi, JS libraries and MS SQL Server Databases.
- Own responsibility for technical design and development, code reviews, test case reviews and successful delivery of client projects and application enhancements.
- Solve complex technical problems, improve performance and help debug support cases while following best practices guidelines.
- Participate with the team in estimating new requirements and defining detailed design that form the basis for development.

Experience required: 4 to 8+ years of experience

Salary & Benefits:
- Salary range 80K to 150K based on quality & experience
- Yearly two festival bonuses
- Launch & Snacks
- Friendly working environment

Essential Skills:
- High proficiency in C#, ASP.NET MVC, Web API

- Good working experience in database design, Writing complex queries using Microsoft SQL Server

Additional Skills:
- Team player, confident, independent and enthusiastic
- Strong critical thinking, problem solving skills.
- Excellent written and oral communication skills.
- Ability to manage multiple priorities, commitments and projects.
- BS in Computer Science or equivalent professional experience from any public or from any UGC approved university

CV Format: ASP.NET_[Years-Of-Experience]_[Your-Full-Name].pdf (i.e. ASP.NET _10_Nazmul_Monir.pdf)

Author: Md.Sheikh Farid Milon
Text:
Escenic is looking for talents in multiple positions.
In my 7.5 years of job experience in five different companies I have found Escenic as the best workplace so far. This is a Norwegian based software company. As my previous experience, Norwegian based companies are really open minded and flat architectured. However, I have found Escenic as an exceptional one.
All of the post requires at least 3+ years job experience in related field. But in my opinion applicant having more than 12 years experience can find this position suitable. But I want to mention that this position is more technical than managerial. People who are accustomed to micromanage other employees and don't feel comfortable in a flat hierarchy might face difficulties to cope up with this company culture.
Escenic offer
- Absolutely zero micromanagement and a super flat hierarchy
- Extreme work life balance
- Transport facilities or transport allowance
- Provident fund, Insurance and other job facilities
- Market standard salary (but not in highest paying company list)
- Extreme friendly company culture (you will never feel that you are being managed by others)
- Super flexible top management (I have never seen this type of mentality even not in other european companies)
- Breakfast, Lunch and other food in dining
- Awesome performance reviewing process (I liked it)
If you don't have related experience but if you are confident in problem solving, personally I think you can apply, because we will consider your overall package not just individual checklist.
Links:
http://hotjobs.bdjobs.com/jobs/escenic/escenic48.htm
http://hotjobs.bdjobs.com/jobs/escenic/escenic49.htm
http://hotjobs.bdjobs.com/jobs/escenic/escenic50.htm

Author: Miles Inspire
Text:
Aiva Labs is looking for a Full Stack Developer - Remote Position
[ About Aiva Labs ]
At Aiva Labs we are building the world’s first Photoshop for Web Experiences. We have over 5000 active business users globally who use our design platform to create interactive website overlays to drive leads and sales. We’re constantly pushing cutting edge features and have been a trending application on the Shopify App Store consistently. Join our team and help create the next evolution on the web!
You can learn more by Googling our company or visit our website at https://aivalabs.com
[ Job Description ]
We are looking for a Full Stack Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with programming. Responsibilities will include the translation of our UI/UX design wireframes to code that will produce visual elements in our application. You will work with our rockstar UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
On the backend, you will be building integrations with different services and identifying opportunities for increasing system and architecture robustness. We are a young group of passionate professionals focused on creating a powerful product and want an experienced web developer to help us continue to execute on our vision.
[ Skills And Qualifications ]
- Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3.
- Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS.
- Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery.
- Proficient understanding of AngularJS 1, PHP, Laravel, Silex, NodeJs.
- Proficient understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
- Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
[ Job Location ]
Our company is based in Waterloo, Canada but you'll be working remotely from anywhere you want.
[ Working Hours ]
We’re looking for a full time commitment (40+ hours/week).
[ Compensation ]
BDT 65,000
[ Additional Notes ]
If you're interested and believe that you meet the above requirements then feel free to send your CV to eve@aivalabs.com

Author: Mahboob Nur
Text:
Mayalogy Private Ltd. is looking for a Backend + DevOps Engineer
MAYA - the first ever organization to participate in Google Launchpad and fastest growing App in Bangladesh is looking to recruit a Backend + DevOps Engineer to join its family to serve 5+ Million user per month. If you’d like to be a part of a dynamic, fast-paced work environment with challenges on a regular basis, In this role, you’ll be tasked with optimizing our applications for speed, security, and most of all, availability. The faster we deploy, the more users get access to our experts.
Application must be submitted within 20th November 2019
# Job Responsibilities :
• Administer, Monitor and Deploy Systems and Services on AWS.
• Upgrading and Scaling our systems to improve security, availability, reliability, and performance.
• Design, develop, and implement software integrations based on user feedback.
• Troubleshoot production issues and coordinate with the development team to streamline code deployment.
• Implement automation tools and frameworks AWS.
• Collaborate with team members to improve the company's engineering tools, systems and procedures, and data security.
• Optimize the company's computing architecture.
• Develop and maintain design and troubleshooting documentation.
• Scaling all the things
• Load Balancing / Proxying [nginx and other stuff]
• Handling security architecture and units.
• Database Scaling and Sharding.
• CI/CIT/CD -- continuous integration, continuous integration testing, and continuous deployment.
• Proper understanding of NAT, HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, UDP, PPP, NTP, FTP, FTPS, SSH and other Routing and OSI Protocols.
• Proper understanding of VM, VPN, VPC
• Design and develop core backend software components
• Comfortable with php | python | java | javaScript.
• Familiar with SQL, MySQL, MongoDB and ideally NoSQL.
• Have a good grasp OOP, MVC.
• Familiar with git and version controlling
# Job Nature: Full time
# Experience Requirements
• 2.5 to 5 year(s)
# Salary Range: 65-85K (Depending on Experience/Skills we required)
# Location: Banani, Dhaka
# Other Benefit:
- Two days weekend
- Two festival bonus
- Friendly working environment
If interested please send your resume to jobs@maya.com.bd with subject [JOB] DevOps Engineer - Maya Engineering Team.

Author: Md Mahfuzus Salam Khan
Text:
Open Position for Software Quality Assurance Engineer
Vacancy: 01
iHealthScreen Inc., New York, USA is looking for software quality assurance engineers responsible for the manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications, requirement analysis, documentation writing etc. for its Dhaka office.
The candidate has future opportunity to move to the USA with H1B visa (this year the company appointed two employees (one with H1B visa and one with J1 visa).
Company Background: The company is a startup, recently founded by Dr. Alauddin Bhuiyan(Ph.D. from the University of Melbourne, Australia, won prestigious Endeavor fellowship (Australia Award), Harvard visiting scholar, was faculty at CSE:SUST/University of Virginia/New York University (NYU); now Adjunct Prof. at CSE, NYU and NYU School of Medicine). He graduated from CSE, SUST (CSE 3rd batch). The company is formed at USA with NIH funds more than $1M and in the process of receiving $5M from private investors and NIH funding. The company is working on the artificial intelligence based prediction model for stroke, heart disease and eye disease. The company has a team in Bangladesh for scaling the company.
Experience requirements:
2 to 5 years.
Role of the position:
1. Design test plans, scenarios, scripts, or procedures in accordance with project scope or delivery dates.
2. Develop, execute and maintain test plans, test scenarios, test cases, and test scripts.
3. Identify problems with program function, output, online screen help, and content and then document errors using a bug tracking system.
4. Report defects to software developers and monitor and track resolutions.
5. Establish and maintain traceability of requirements through test plans and cases.
6. Participate in product design reviews to provide input on functional requirements, product designs, schedules, or potential problems.
7. Review software documentation to ensure technical accuracy, compliance, or completeness, or to mitigate risks.
8. Partner with business analysts and project managers to ensure requirements are documented, understood, covered by test plans and accurately tested.
Additional requirements:
1. 2+ years of experience working as QA in any Software company.
2. Knowledge of API service, Automation test, Load test are added advantage.
3. Familiar with Management tools like JIRA, GitLab is a plus.
4. Must be committed to his/her work.
5. Must be a good team player.
6. Always should have a can do attitude.
7. Cross-browser compatibility testing is a must.
If you think that you are suitable for the position - immediately forward your CV with your live portfolio: office@iHealthscreen.org . In the email subject please write “Software Quality Assurance Engineer” for which position you are applying.  The position is open for immediate recruitment.
Regarding salary: 30-50K
Weekly off days: Friday and Saturday
Office hours: 8:30AM to 5:30PM
Office location:  Shyamoli, Dhaka
Other facilities: Snacks, tea, and coffee are available.
Contact:
Email: office@iHealthscreen.org
Mobile: +88 01314496698 (Cell Mr. Nasir)

Author: Shawon Arefin
Text:
PeddleCloud is hiring for the post "Software Engineer (UI)"  (Full-Time)
Responsibilities:
1. Deep understanding of Agile Software System development, design patterns, principles and best practices.
2. Develop a deep understanding of relevant systems and business goals through researching  to guide you in designing and building effective user interfaces.
3. Own and architect modern interactive UI/UX flows of designing Everyday things which will make millions of our users not to rethink keeping them hooked.
4. Communicate and partner cross-functionally with teams in product and software development.
5. Drive new product initiatives forward by thinking creatively with good judgment.
6. Perform and deliver without supervision, in time, in high quality and proactively communicate about progress, challenges and success.
7. Evaluate and select the best tools (framework, library, practices) for the problems at hand and ensure standards in your team.
Technical Requirements:
• Deep understanding of Languages: Javascript (ES5 / ES6), HTML5, TypeScript, WebRTC, WebSocket, nodeJS, CSS3 (with animation and advanced filtering), Sass, Stylus, SVG.
• SPA framework: ReactJS/VueJS. Though for web application our preferences is always VueJS.
• Flux architecture and its relevant framework, e.g. Vuex for Vue, Redux for ReactJS.
• For mobile application  ReactNative. We are currently evaluating Flutter by google.
• Solid Understanding of using versioning tools, e.g. Git, BitBucket.
• Nice to have:
- Languages: PHP,  Java, Python
- Database Concept: PostgreSQL, MySQL
Educational & Professional Requirements:
• Graduation from any reputed University. B.Sc. in Computer Science or similar education is preferable.
• Prior professional experience of 2+ years in relevant field like building distributed systems and web services in a variety of languages and platforms.
Company Name:  PeddleCloud
Location: Kalabagan, Dhanmondi
Employment Status: Full-time
Salary: Market Competitive
Office Hour: 11am - 7pm (6 Days/week)
Company Details:
PeddleCloud is a tech based startup where we work primarily in Sports, Education, Media arenas, developing SaaS, API and App solutions.
Our Technologies:
-Backend System Architecture: Microservice, Event Sourcing
-Backend Language and libraries: Java, Vertx, RxJava2 and our own developed service framework.
-Databases, Queue and In-Memory Database: Postgresql, Apache Ignite, Redis, Kafka, Apache Pulsar.
-Frontend Application Language and Frameworks: nodeJS, VueJS, Quasar for Vue, Vuex for flux.
Interested applicants are requested to drop their CV with a Cover Letter in this address: info@peddlecloud.com

Author: Beatnik Technology Ltd.
Text:
Job Title: SQL Engineer
Website: https://orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 1
Company Name: Orbund LLC
Job Description
We are looking for a SQL developer who will be responsible for designing databases and ensuring their stability, reliability, and performance. You will also work other developers optimizing in-application SQL statements as necessary, and establishing best practices. You will help solve all database usage issues and come up with ideas and advice that can help avoid such problems in the future.
Responsibilities
Help write and optimize in-application SQL statements
Ensure performance, security, and availability of databases
Prepare documentations and specifications
Handle common database procedures such as upgrade, backup, recovery, migration, etc.
Profile server resource usage and optimize and tweak as necessary
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills and Qualifications
Strong proficiency with SQL and its variation among popular databases
Experience with some of the modern relational databases
Skilled at optimizing large complicated SQL statements
Knowledge of best practices when dealing with relational databases
Capable of configuring popular database engines and orchestrating clusters as necessary
Ability to plan resource requirements from high-level specifications
Capable of troubleshooting common database issues
Familiar with tools that can aid with profiling server resource usage and optimizing it
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git
B.Sc Degree in the related field (Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering or Related Field)
Programming experience with Java, and SQL
Job Experience Requirement: 1-2 Years
Job Location: Mohammadpur, Dhaka
Salary: Negotiable
Working Hour: Monday-Friday 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM

Author: Imam Tarik
Text:
ডেভস্কীল ট্রেইনিং একাডেমী দেশের সেরা সফটওয়্যার ডেভেলপমেন্ট বিষয়ক প্রশিক্ষণ কেন্দ্র। ডেভস্কীল ট্রেইনিং একাডেমীর উদ্দেশ্য সফটওয়্যার কোম্পানিতে দক্ষতার সাথে কাজ করার উপযোগী দক্ষ সফটওয়্যার ইঞ্জিনিয়ার প্রস্তুত করা। এই উদ্দেশ্য নিয়ে আমরা আমাদের সকল কোর্স পরিচালনা করে থাকি। উল্লেখ্য আমাদের সকল কোর্স অনলাইন লাইভ ক্লাসের মাধ্যমে পরিচালনা করা হয়। শিক্ষকরাও বাসা থেকে ক্লাস নিয়ে থাকেন।
ডেভস্কীলে শিক্ষক হিসাবে অন্তর্ভুক্ত হওয়ার সুবিধাসমূহঃ
১) সাপ্তাহিক ছুটির দিনে ও রাতের বেলায় (যেমন রাত ১০ টায়) ক্লাস
২) শিক্ষার্থী প্রতি ৫০% হারে কোর্স ফি শেয়ার করা হয় (পেমেন্ট চার্জ বাদ দেয়ার পর)
৩) কোর্স প্রতি লক্ষাধিক টাকা জবের পাশাপাশি অতিরিক্ত আয়ের সুযোগ
৪) ব্যাংক ট্রান্সফারের মাধ্যমে রেগুলার নিশ্চিত পেমেন্ট।
আমাদের নতুন কিছু কোর্সের জন্য দক্ষ ও অভিজ্ঞ শিক্ষক প্রয়োজন।
নিম্নোক্ত বিষয়ে আগ্রহী শিক্ষকদের আবেদন করার জন্য অনুরোধ করা যাচ্ছে –
১) প্রফেশনাল লারাভেল ওয়েব ডেভেলপমেন্ট
২) প্রফেশনাল এঙ্গুলার ডেভেলপমেন্ট
৩) ওয়েব ডেভেলপমেন্ট বেসিক (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJs)
৪) পাইথন ৩
৫) প্রফেশনাল জেঙ্গো ওয়েব ডেভেলপমেন্ট
৬) প্রফেশনাল রিএক্ট জেএস ডেভেলপমেন্ট
প্রার্থীদের নিম্নোক্ত বৈশিষ্ট্য থাকা প্রয়োজনীয়
১) ন্যূনতম ৩ বছরের পেশাদার কারিগরি দক্ষতা
২) সংশ্লিষ্ট বিষয় সম্পর্কে গভীর ও স্বচ্ছ ধারণা
৩) স্পষ্ট ও সুন্দরভাবে কথা বলা
৪) যত্ন সহকারে শিখানোর মানসিকতা
কেবল মাত্র যোগ্য ও অভিজ্ঞ প্রার্থীদের আবেদন করার জন্য অনুরোধ করা যাচ্ছে। আগ্রহী প্রার্থীকে নিম্নোক্ত ইমেইলে সিভি/ রেজুমি পাঠাতে হবে।
Email: info@devskill.com
Web: https://training.devskill.com

Author: Tanjina Sharmeen
Text:
Job Title: Web Designer
Website: https://orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 1
Company Name: Orbund LLC
Job Description
As a Web designer, you will create the look, layout, feel, functionality and features of all the websites we are developing. You will work on developing new websites and on enhancing our existing Web properties.
You will work closely with our creative directors, project managers, strategists, and other design team members to develop specifications and make adjustments regarding the use of new and emerging Web technologies.
Responsibilities
Your key responsibilities will be meeting with clients, using wireframing tools, using functional user-interface techniques in your Web design workflow. You will also be responsible for writing clean, semantic front-end code - HTML5, CSS3, JAVA.
More responsibilities in detail:
Work with clients and project managers to build and refine graphic designs for websites. Must have strong skills in Photoshop, Sketch, InvsionApp, UX Pin, or equivalent application(s).
Convert raw images and layouts from a graphic designer into CSS/XHTML themes.
Determine appropriate architecture, and other technical solutions, and make relevant recommendations to clients.
Develop and maintain robust Web style guides for all our consumer- and business-facing products.
Provide thought-leadership on Web design best practices and next-generation digital trends.
Create high-fidelity mock-ups for vetting and user testing, and finished .psd files for development.
Assist in the development of a new brand and how to convey it cohesively across our multiple Web properties.
Create site layout/user interface by using standard HTML / CSS  / JAVA practices.
Requirements
Bachelor’s in computer science or related field, or significant equivalent experience.
Two to three years minimum experience with HTML/XHTML, CSS & Bootstrap.
A strong visual and technical portfolio.
A high level of proficiency using Adobe products (or equivalent tools).
Knowledge of browser compatibility across multiple platforms and devices.
Strong ability to design with accessibility in mind.
Experience working in an agile/scrum development process.
Familiarity with multiple HTML frameworks, strong JavaScript & jQuery skills (such as consuming APIs)
Experience Requirement: 2-3 Years
Job Location: Mohammadpur, Dhaka
Salary: Negotiable
Working Hour: Monday-Friday 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Other facilities: Free Lunch, Tea/Coffee, Annual Retreat
Salary Review:  Yearly
Festival Bonus: 2 (Yearly)
If you believe you are the right candidate, then Apply before November 30, 2019.

Author: Southtech Group
Text:
Job Title: Java Developer
Website: www.orbund.com
Number of Vacancies: 2
Company Name: Orbund LLC

Founded in 2008, Analyzen is a privately-owned company, headquartered in Dhaka, Bangladesh. We provide a variety of products and services for local and international companies and leverage our deep expertise to pursue market opportunities by providing our customized software solutions. We develop cutting-edge tools and methodologies that give us a competitive edge with our product and service offerings. Analyzen is the first ever Technology Company in Bangladesh to receive 3 Championship Awards at BASIS National Awards 2019. Visit www.analyzenbd.com for more info.

Full stack Developer
We are seeking a Developer responsible for 70% back-end and 30% front-end development. The work will mainly be conducted in Laravel and WordPress.

Author: InNeed.Cloud
Text:
Bongo Solutions provides an online, cross-platform multimedia experiences for thousands of users. First and foremost, we specialize in building OTT products that allow users to watch video-on-demand and live television. In addition, we design, develop, and host entertainment portals that include micro-transactions, user profiles, gamification leaderboards, and data analytics. Our users have access to top of the line video-streaming products similar to NetFlix, Hulu, and YouTube. Look at Bongo Solutions and Bioscopelive to see an example of the exciting projects we are working on.
We’re looking for people who are passionate about their work, and who are looking to make an impact on a product that will be used by millions of users. If you’re excited about working with these technologies, collaborating with some of the biggest names within the telecommunications industry, then we’d love to hear from you. This job posting is hiring for Mid & Senior level positions.
*Responsibilities:*
* Design and build custom Android applications that show the newest technologies developed by Google.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Work with outside data sources and API’s.
* Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
* Architect Android project using build variants and build flavours to help automate and streamline the management of various Android applications from one codebase.
* Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
*Essential Requirements:*
* BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
Someone who takes pride in the quality of their code
* A strong background with open source, Java or Kotlin, and mobile applications
* Fluency in the object-oriented languages specifically.
* Experience with developing user friendly UI/UX.
* Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
* Understanding of the dependency injection design pattern.
* Experience developing network applications that stream media.
Interested people, send your cv to zubair@bongobd.com
For more details: http://career.bongo-solutions.com.s3-website-ap-southeast-1…

TEKNORDIC is an offshore software development firm based on Norway looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) engineer to develop and execute exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality for its offshore team in Dhaka.
No. of Vacancy: 01
Responsibilities
Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools
Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs
Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
Monitor debugging process results
Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions
Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts
Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies
Requirements
Proven work experience at least 2 years in software development
Proven work experience at least 2 years in software quality assurance
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing
Hands-on experience with automated testing tools
Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
Additional Benefits

Weekly Holiday: 2 days, Friday and Saturday
Performance Bonus
Festival Bonus: 1
Salary review: Yearly

Author: Shamim Shuhagh
Text:
Appnap Technologies Ltd. is looking for "Senior iOS Developer"

JOB DESCRIPTION
We’re aiming to become one of the leaders in mobile app industry for developing and publishing mobile apps. How could software engineering not be at the very core of this enormously ambitious mission? Already serving hundreds of thousands of users and adding more every day, we are looking forward to rely on our exceptional engineers to keep raising the bar in terms of code quality, speed of execution, and especially user experience. With bigger and bigger frontiers to conquer, we’re looking for a passionate, bright, and driven software engineer that is eager to bring our apps to the next level.
A FEW EXAMPLES OF YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES AS AN iOS DEVELOPER:
Plan, design and implement applications for iOS.
Monitor the performance, quality, and responsiveness of company's applications.
Work with the rest of the team to define, design, and develop new features.
Identify process bottlenecks.
Find and fix bugs in a timely manner.
Suggest improvement for the current processes.
REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS:
Proficiency in Swift.
Professional  experience of minimum 4 years developing iOS applications.
Strong knowledge in native iOS mobile software development.
Experience of AVFoundation, AudioToolbox, the Core Graphics framework.
Mobile app-oriented design patterns (MVVM, Reactive).
Experience with continuous integration techniques and tools (Fastlane, Bamboo).
Experience in automated testing practices and tools (XCTest, Snapshot tests).
Experience in building modular code and third-party dependency management (Cocoapods)
Knowledge of performance limits and characteristics.
Knowledge of RESTful APIs to connect to back-end services.
Understanding of UI design and a user-oriented focus.
Suggest improvement for the current processes.
Experience with CocoaPods.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git.
WHAT WE OFFER:
Huge impact: You’ll be working on products used by hundreds of thousands of people all around the world. The quality of your work will make a decisive difference both to the users and to Appnap.
Talented, knowledgeable colleagues: You’ll get the chance to learn (and teach too!) some of the brightest and most skilled people you’ll      ever meet. Your talent is going to blossom here.
Own products: We don’t work for clients, but only develop our own apps.
International reach: Our audience is wildly international. We’re a global reality.
COMPENSATION AND OTHER BENEFITS:
02 weekly holidays.
World-class working environment.
Lunch and snacks offered by office.
Recreation  facility (Home theatre and Play Station 4 Pro).
02 yearly festival bonuses.
Performance bonus.
Yearly salary review.
Yearly official tour.
Casual leave,Sick Leave, Annual Leave and public holidays as gazette by the government and organization’s decision.
SALARY: BDT 70,000 - 90,000 (NEGOTIABLE).
LOCATION:
Corporate Office, Dhaka

APPLICATION SUBMISSION DEADLINE: 21st November, 2019

For details please follow the link: https://appnap.io/careers

Author: Alamgir Hossen Joy
Text:
💡চাকুরীঃ
২ জন HTML Developer এবং ২ জন PSD Designer (intermediate Level)
➡️কেমন ডেভেলপার খুঁজছেন ?
উত্তরঃ এইচটিএমএল এবং পিএসডি সম্পর্কে পরিষ্কার ধারনা। থিমফরেস্ট সম্পর্কে ধারনা অথবা কাজ করবার অভিজ্ঞতা। ধৈর্য এবং শেখার আগ্রহ।
➡️বেতন কেমন ?
উত্তরঃ ১৫-২৫
➡️বেতন এতো কম কেন?
উত্তরঃ ফ্রেশার টাইপের ডেভেলপার খুঁজছি। বেতন কম মনে হলে অ্যাপ্লাই করবেন না।
➡️ কাদের জন্য এই পোস্ট ?
উত্তরঃ "সুযোগ দিলে শিখে নেবো" টাইপের ডেভেলপার / কাজ জানেন কিন্তু একটা টিমের সাথে কাজ করলে আরও ভালো কিছু শিখতে পারতেন।
➡️যোগদান কবে?
উত্তরঃ পহেলা নভেম্বর।
➡️অন্যান্য সুবিধা কি কি ?
উত্তরঃ পারফরমেন্স বোনাস, সাপ্তাহিক ছুটি, বাসসরিক ১৫ দিন ঐচ্ছিক ছুটি, দুপুরের খাবার, আনলিমিটেড কফি আর বিকালের স্ন্যাক্স।
➡️বেতন বাড়বে কবে ?
উত্তরঃ ৬ মাস পর পর।
➡️প্রতিষ্ঠান কি ধরনের কাজ করে ?
উত্তরঃ আমাদের প্রতিষ্ঠান শুধুমাত্র Envato (CodeCanyon & ThemeForest ) নিয়ে কাজ করে।
➡️কিভাবে অ্যাপ্লাই করবো?
উত্তরঃ অ্যাপ্লাই করতে আপনার করা বেস্ট কাজের ডেমো লিঙ্ক অথবা থিমফরেস্টে আপ্প্রভ আইটেমের লিঙ্ক সহ আপনার সিভি মেইল করুনঃ abir@thesoftking.com | মেইলে আপনার কাঙ্ক্ষিত বেতন উল্লেখ করতে ভুলবেন না। মেইলের সাবজেক্ট অবশ্যই এইচটিএমএল ডেভেলপারদের জন্য "Intermediate HTML Developer" এবং পিএসডি ডিজাইনারদের জন্য 'Intermediate PSD Designer' হতে হবে।
বিঃ দ্রঃ এই পোস্ট ফ্রেশারদের জন্য। অভিজ্ঞতার দরকার নাই। আমরা ৩-৪ জন এইচটিএমএল ডেভেলপার এবং পিএসডি ডিজাইনারদের নিজেদের মতো করে গড়ে নিতে চাচ্ছি। পোস্ট'টা শেয়ার অথবা ট্যাগ করতে পারেন, এতে হয়তো কারো উপকার হলেও হতে পারে। দয়া করে তর্ক করতে আসবেন না,পারলে ২-৩ জন ফ্রেশারকে ক্যারিয়ার গড়তে হেল্প করুন।

Text:
We ( Hoxro Dev Centre ) are looking for a talented "Front-End Developer ( Angular )" who would work on our Enterprise level Legal Case Management System.

Please include your responses against the following queries in your cover letter.

Have you ever imagine to work on the product which would be the most intuitive, agile, scalable?
Would you feel proud to invent something new?

Can you rate your core skills out of 10?

Are you a Front-End ( HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, SASS ) Ninja?
Are you compassionate?
Do you hold the highest level of integrity?

If above are your core qualities then we are looking for you!

Job Responsibilities:
 4+ years of experience developing rich UI/Front-end for user-facing enterprise-level web applications
 Hands-on experience with JQuery, JavaScript, HTML DOM, HTML5, CSS3, single-page web application and client-side MVC architecture
 Experience with data-driven web development, including strong knowledge of JSON and AJAX, Must possess a deep understanding of APIs, HTTP and REST architecture
 Experience working with designers cutting up layouts to implement pixel perfect pages

 Experience with version control systems such as GIT

 Clear communication skills (written and oral) and an ability to work effectively with marketing teams
 Willingness to learn and grow

Educational Requirements:
BSc/MSc in CSE, CS, EEE, Physics or relevant from public/private university

Skills Required:
Angular, AngularJS, HTML5 & CSS3, JavaScript, SASS
ACM problem-solving skills will be considered as a good plus

 3 to 4 year(s)

THE APPLICANTS SHOULD HAVE EXPERIENCE IN THE FOLLOWING AREA(S):
Ajax, Angular, AngularJS, ERP Implementation, HTML5 & CSS3, JavaScript, Microsoft Azure, SASS, web application

Resident Company is UK and Domain is Legal Documentation and Workflow (Our System is used by Lawyers to run their cases)

Lunch & Snack

30-45K BDT ( based on experience and capability )

Author: Plabon Shekh
Text:
Location: House 262, Road 19, Level 6, Unit A, DOHS Mohakhali.
 The boring platform ltd is looking for ‘Android Developers’.
Interested people fill the form and drop your cv here: cv https://forms.gle/v3LLhm5bbak6cn8d7

Company overview:
The BORING Platform initiative is the introduction of a new Digital and Analytical platform in Bangladesh with some innovative and benevolent goals. As a company, our vision is to enhance the community with Psychological and Analytical projects to make life easier, informative and ENTERTAINING for the people. Our company is data-driven & FUN at its core and the projects we do are significantly oriented towards enhancing the day-to-day living, commuting and working process of Bangladesh. We are setting-up a team of potential and highly innovative individuals who share the same vision as us and who are willing to work in new and unique ideas. If you are an individual who shares the same enthusiasm as us, we welcome you to join the family and we hope, with you we can signify our vision to the community.              

Job Description
We are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a vast number of diverse Android devices. Your primary focus will be the development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential.

Responsibilities
Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

Skills
Able to make kiosk app.(Kiosk)
Strong knowledge of Android SDK, different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
Ability to design applications around natural user interfaces, such as “touch”
Familiarity with the use of additional sensors, such as gyroscopes and accelerometers
Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Understanding of Google’s Android design principles and interface guidelines
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Familiarity with continuous integration

Text:
Job opening for IT Security Specialist
Preferred academic qualification:
Graduates in Computer Engineering/Science or equivalent (graduated before 2016 July)
Required Specific Expertise:
 Proven experience in vulnerability assessment and penetration testing of custom developed web application, data center intrusion, system auditing, and other security issues.
 Security certification such as CEH/ CLPTP, CISM/CISSP or equivalent.
 Certification expired issue will be overlooked.
 Knowledge on various vulnerability assessment tools.
 Experience in IP address, firewall, proxy server, DNS, routing protocol, risk assessment etc.
Job description:
 Perform scheduled vulnerability scan of online system using vulnerability scanning tools with prior approval from Company;
 Mitigate identified High and Medium vulnerabilities of existing System to Low and no vulnerabilities state;
 Ensure compliance to dgMarket Information Security policies and procedures approved by Government of Bangladesh;
 Apply security patches to all system/devices on regular basis and
complete system hardening of system/devices and report to dgMarket Authority.
 Monitor and analyse the Security Incident Event Management Logs and take proactive action to mitigate the cybersecurity threats;
 Implement Information Security Policy of existing system in company Operations/process and all components of existing system;
 Assist dgMarket in taking critical decision in emergency situation of the existing system concerning IT security;
 Any other task related to job description
Salary: Negotiable
Working day: Sunday to Thursday
Please make sure, to send your updated CV with recent photograph. Your CV should include your educational details (Session) and Year of certification. In Email body please mention your expected salary. Also make sure to add subject "IT Security Analyst".

dgMarket Bangladesh Ltd
House #1087 (1st floor) , Road # 6/A , Avenue# 07 , Mirpur DOHS , Dhaka-1216

Business: dgMarket is the pioneer in providing information on Tenders and Procurement Opportunities worldwide. We have offices in 7 countries and operate all over the world. HQ is at Washington D.C, USA and other offices at: Canada, India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Paris and Morocco.

Author: Motakabbir Morshed Dolar
Text:
What You'll Do:
1. Implement all necessary clauses and controls to achieve ISO 27001 certification for the company.
2. Implement necessary controls and policies for securing our AWS environments, Kubernetes clusters and the systems running within them.
3. Perform security design reviews for infrastructure-related projects.
4. Document and communicate security configuration and hardening guidelines for infrastructure components.
5. Document, review and update all of the security policies, manuals and guidelines regularly.
6. Run Threat Modeling, Internal and External VAPT on our infrastructure and applications on a regular basis and share the report with the stakeholders.
7. Craft automated security auditing, monitoring and testing software and infrastructure related to the above.
8. Administer security-related infrastructure and applications.
9. Deploy and integrate Intrusion Detection System and Intrusion Prevention System in the systems.
Who You Are:
1. You are dedicated to protecting the integrity of our security environment.
2. You love providing mentorship to internal teams surrounding security best practices.
3. You thrive in a fast-paced start-up environment.
What You Bring:
1. You possess a deep understanding and recent experience with Linux system administration and hardening experience.
2. You are proficient in scripting languages, such as Python, Bash or Golang.
3. You love to play with DevOps tools such as Ansible, HashiCorp Vault and Jenkins.
4. You have experience performing threat modeling for systems and infrastructure to identify potential security issues.
Requirements:
1. AWS administration/architectural experience.
2. Experience with vulnerability management processes.
Good to have:
1. Industry certification (CISSP, CISA, PSP, ISO 27001) is considered an asset.
2. Recent and meaningful work with Kubernetes and Docker.
This position would initially be a temporary placement for one year and subject to extension based on client organization need.
Interested candidates are requested to send resume directly nowshad@telenorhealth.com mentioning title of the position in the subject line.

Author: Cycore Studios
Text:
Aiva Labs is looking for a Full Stack Developer - Remote Position
[ About Aiva Labs ]
At Aiva Labs we are building the world’s first Photoshop for Web Experiences. We have over 5000 active business users globally who use our design platform to create interactive website overlays to drive leads and sales. We’re constantly pushing cutting edge features and have been a trending application on the Shopify App Store consistently. Join our team and help create the next evolution on the web!
You can learn more by Googling our company or visit our website at https://aivalabs.com
[ Job Description ]
We are looking for a Full Stack Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with programming. Responsibilities will include the translation of our UI/UX design wireframes to code that will produce visual elements in our application. You will work with our rockstar UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
On the backend, you will be building integrations with different services and identifying opportunities for increasing system and architecture robustness. We are a young group of passionate professionals focused on creating a powerful product and want an experienced web developer to help us continue to execute on our vision.
[ Skills And Qualifications ]
- Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3.
- Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS.
- Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery.
- Proficient understanding of AngularJS 1, PHP, Laravel, Silex, NodeJs.
- Proficient understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
- Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
[ Job Location ]
Our company is based in Waterloo, Canada but you'll be working remotely from anywhere you want.
[ Working Hours ]
We’re looking for a full time commitment (40+ hours/week).
[ Compensation ]
BDT 75,000
[ Additional Notes ]
If you're interested and believe that you meet the above requirements then feel free to send your CV to eve@aivalabs.com

Author: Ahasan Habib
Text:
আসসালামু আলাইকুম  , আমি ঠাকুরগাঁও পলিটেকনিক ইনস্টিটিউটে সপ্তম পর্বে অধ্যায়নরত একজন ছাত্র . ইন্টার্নশিপ সম্পর্কে লিখব  আমাদের কারিকুলাম অনুযায়ী  তৃতীয় পর্বে পাইথন ছিল. তখন থেকেই আমি পাইথনে কাজ করে আসতেছি. আমি পরবর্তীতে পাইথনের ফ্রেমওয়ার্ক জ্যাঙ্গো নিয়ে কাজ শুরু করি . আমি তিনটি প্রজেক্ট তৈরি করেছি প্রজেক্টগুলো হল ব্লগ সাইট, স্টুডেন্ট অ্যাটেনডেন্স সিস্টেম, ই-কমার্স. ই-কমার্স সাইটে পেমেন্ট গেটওয় সিস্টেম শেষ হয়নি পেমেন্ট গেটওয় কাজ করতেছি . আমাদের ডিপ্লোমা প্রবিধান অনুযায়ী সপ্তম পর্বের পর বিভিন্ন কোম্পানিতে ইন্টার্নশিপ যেতে হয় . যেহেতু আমি পাইথনে প্রফেশনাল কাজ করছি তাই আমি পাইথন  ব্যবহার করে এমন কোম্পানিতে ইন্টার্নশিপ এ যেতে চাই. আমার ইন্টার্নশিপ জানুয়ারি থেকে শুরু হবে .যদি কোন কোম্পানি জানুয়ারি থেকে ইন্টার্নশিপের লোক নিতে চাই দয়া করে আমাকে জানাবেন..
অগ্রিম ধন্যবাদ সবাইকে
আমার দক্ষতা গুলো নিচে দিলাম :
Python
Django
Javascript
Jquery (Javascript library)
Mysql (Database)
Bootstrap
Css
Html5
আমার ভবিষ্যৎ পরিকল্পনা :
আমি Machine learning নিয়ে কাজ করব .

Candidate experience and qualifications
* Experienced PHP developer with an expert level understanding of WordPress (version 5.x)
* HTML5, CSS3
* Experience designing WordPress sites and WordPress themes
* Experience with WordPress page builders
* Good spoken and written English
Project
Build a package that can be installed on top of a fresh WordPress installation,
that turns the site into a "pagebuilder site" making it easy to create and update
web pages for users without WordPress experience.
The site should get a simple, clean base layout, the ability to add and create
sub pages, and build the page structures using easy to understand blocks of content

Author: Sajid Israq
Text:
Aiva Labs is looking for a Full Stack Developer - Remote Position
[ About Aiva Labs ]
At Aiva Labs we are building the world’s first Photoshop for Web Experiences. We have over 5000 active business users globally who use our design platform to create interactive website overlays to drive leads and sales. We’re constantly pushing cutting edge features and have been a trending application on the Shopify App Store consistently. Join our team and help create the next evolution on the web!
You can learn more by Googling our company or visit our website at https://aivalabs.com
[ Job Description ]
We are looking for a Full Stack Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with programming. Responsibilities will include the translation of our UI/UX design wireframes to code that will produce visual elements in our application. You will work with our rockstar UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
On the backend, you will be building integrations with different services and identifying opportunities for increasing system and architecture robustness. We are a young group of passionate professionals focused on creating a powerful product and want an experienced web developer to help us continue to execute on our vision.
[ Skills And Qualifications ]
- Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3.
- Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS.
- Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery.
- Good understanding of Angular JS 1 and PHP, Laravel, Silex, NodeJs.
- Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
- Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small.
adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
- Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
- Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.
[ Job Location ]
Our company is based in Waterloo, Canada but you'll be working remotely from anywhere you want.
[ Working Hours ]
We’re looking for a full time commitment (40+ hours/week).
[ Compensation ]
BDT 45,000 - 60,000 ( depending on skill level )
[ Additional Notes ]
If you're interested and believe that you meet the above requirements then feel free to drop your CV at jafar@aivalabs.com

Text:
আসসালামু আলাইকুম , আমি রাজশাহীর একটি বেসরকারি পলিটেকনিক ইনস্টিটিউটে সপ্তম পর্বে অধ্যায়নরত একজন ছাত্র . আমাদের কারিকুলাম অনুযায়ী ৪র্থ পর্বে PHP ছিল. তখন থেকেই আমি PHP কাজ করে আসতেছি. আমি পরবর্তীতে PHP ফ্রেমওয়ার্ক ল্যারাভেল নিয়ে কাজ শুরু করি . আমি চারটি প্রজেক্ট তৈরি করেছি প্রজেক্টগুলো হল ব্লগ সাইট, স্কুল-কলেজ ম্যানেজমেন্ট সিস্টেম, ই-কমার্স(ল্যারাভেল) , রেস্তোঁরেন্ট ম্যানেজমেন্ট সিস্টেম(ল্যারাভেল) । বর্তমানে এন্ডোয়েড অ্যাপ ডিভলপমেন্ট নিয়ে কাজ করছি। আমাদের ডিপ্লোমা প্রবিধান অনুযায়ী সপ্তম পর্বের পর বিভিন্ন কোম্পানিতে ইন্টার্নশিপ যেতে হয় . যেহেতু আমি এখোন এন্ডোয়েড কাজ করছি তাই আমি এন্ডোয়েড কাজ করে এমন কোম্পানিতে ইন্টার্নশিপ এ যেতে চাই. আমার ইন্টার্নশিপ জানুয়ারি থেকে শুরু হবে .যদি কোন কোম্পানি ইন্টার্নশিপের লোক নিতে চাই দয়া করে আমাকে জানাবেন..
ধন্যবাদ সবাইকে।

Author: Md Nazmul Hossain
Text:
আপডেটঃ

কাউকে পারসোনালি অ্যাটাক করার আগে আরেবার ভাবুন।

১। অনেকেই স্যালারি কম নিয়ে আমাকে ধুয়ে ফেলতেসেন। 10k আমার মতেও অনেক কম হয়ে যায়, রেঞ্জটা অফিস থেকে দেয়া। আমি এখানে কিছু করতে পারতেসিনা, ভালো না লাগলে ইগ্নোর করেন। তবে তিন মাস পরে কনফার্ম করতে পারলে স্যালারি নুন্যতম ~30k হবে আশাকরি, এতটুকু রিকমেন্ডেশন আমি অফিসকে করা যাবে।এই অফিসে আগে ইন্টার্নশিপের প্রথা ছিলনা, কোম্পানিকে অনেক রিকুয়েস্ট করে ইন্টার্নশিপের ব্যাবস্থা করা হয়েছে যাতে নতুনরা একটু সুযোগ পায়। এখন এইটাই আমাদের বিশাল অপরাধ হয়ে গেছে দেখতেছি।

২। অনেকেই বলতেছেন কোড সাবমিট করছেন, কি ভুল হইছে। আপনি নিজেই requirements গুলা ভালভাবে পড়ে আরেকবার মিলান। ভুলগুলো ঠিক করে আবার রিসাবমিট করেন। আপনি কোয়ালিফাইড না হলে এক-দেড় মাস পড়েই আবার আপনাকে বাদ দিয়ে দিবে, তখন আবার একটা ভুল বুঝাবুঝির সৃষ্টি হবে।

৩। অনেকেই বলতেছেন requirements অনেক কঠিন হয়ে গেছে। একেবারেই ডেভেলপমেন্ট জানেননা এমন কাউকে আমরা নিতে পারব না, দুঃখিত। ভালো না লাগলে ইগ্নোর করেন।

-----------------

চারজন JavaScript Intern এর জন্য জব পোস্ট করেছিলাম, এখন পর্যন্ত একজনকে হায়ার করতে পারছি। জব পোষ্টের সাথে একটা কোড চ্যালেঞ্জ অ্যাড করে দেওয়াতে আজাইরা অ্যাপ্লিকেশনগুলো কমে গেছে, এ সপ্তাহে কোড রিভিউ করে ইন্টারভিউতে ডাকার মত তেমন কাউকে পেলাম না। অ্যাপ্লিকেশন এর শেষ তারিখ ছিল 15 ই অক্টোবর পর্যন্ত, এখন দেখা যাচ্ছে সেটা আরো দুই মাস বাড়িয়ে দিতে হবে। মানুষজন প্রচুর পরিমাণে ভুল করতেছে।নিচের ভুলগুলো শুধরে এপ্লাই করলে সম্ভাবনা অনেক বেড়ে যাবে।
- খুব ভালো করে টাস্কের রিকোয়ারমেন্ট গুলা পড়েন, ক্লিয়ার না হলে আবার পড়েন। যেটা করতে বলা হয়েছে শুধু সেটাই করেন। অপ্রয়োজনীয় জিনিসপত্র সংযুক্ত করবেন না।
- কারো কোড কপি পেস্ট করে পাঠানো যাবে না। একই কোড একাধিক জন শেয়ার করা যাবে না।
- আমাকে ফেসবুকে নক করে টাস্কের ব্যাপারে হেল্প চাওয়া যাবে না, এটা আপনার কাজ। আজাইরা ইমোশনাল মেসেজ দিয়ে সফট কর্নার তৈরি করার চেষ্টা করবেন না।
জব পোস্টটা দেখা যাবে এই লিঙ্কে - http://simp.ly/p/qf5nt1
Salary: 10k
Company: Aaroza Infotech Ltd.
Office time: 9 AM - 6 PM, Monday - Friday.

Author: Proshanto Kumar Saha
Text:
Company Description
We are ShopUp, funded by Sequoia and Omidyar network. ShopUp is a super platform for micro entrepreneurs. We have more than 100k micro-merchants, we help our merchants through financing, advertising, and product sourcing. ShopUp is changing how finance and commerce work in emerging markets like Bangladesh.
Job Description
Build mobile applications in React Native
Work closely with, and incorporate feedback from, product management, interaction designers, and back-end engineers
Keep up with the latest web developments but take a pragmatic approach to adopting tools and technologies
Rapidly fix bugs and solve problems
Pro-actively look for ways to make ShopUp better
Qualifications
REQUIREMENTS
Strong computer science fundamentals
Expert knowledge of JavaScript (ECMAScript 2015), React (and at least a state management library like Redux/Mobx) as well as the latest web standards and technologies
Demonstrable experience in building great mobile web application interfaces
Good understanding of CSS-based design and responsive best practices with an eye for pixel perfect layouts
Good knowledge of Git (version control system)
Experience with Typescript and Node.js (Nice to have)
Knowledge of native application development for senior developers.
ABOUT YOU
Analytical mindset with problem-solving skills
Curious and open to new ideas and flexible to change
Have a Get Things Done attitude
Effective communicator with all levels of the business
Additional Information
What to expect from our recruiting process
First meeting: before diving deeper into your tech skills, we want to know who you are and what motivates you.
Technical interview: we’ll discuss areas relevant to you ranging from frontend/backend development to networks, security, and development methods. We’re trying to get a clear overview of your skills and where you could learn more.
Coding exercise: we’ll be pair programming in Node.js environment to make sure that you can also code. Previous experience with Node.js or JavaScript is required.
Meet your future team to learn what they are working with. After that the final interview with our founders.

Author: ASDTechLtd.
Text:
[Job post on behalf of a friend, deadline was Sept 30. But I think they will still accept CV from right candidates]

MetLife Bangladesh is looking for an IT Programmer who will need to drive the design and development of high-quality software products for our customers. The role requires in-depth knowledge of Programming Languages focusing on .NET MVC / MVC Core. The incumbent should possess the ability to communicate well with relevant stakeholders, understand their requirements clearly, and translate those requirements into software that fits the necessity perfectly.

Job Description
Design and build enterprise business application
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze, design, and craft new features
Implement new technologies to maximize application performance
Integrate enterprise applications with existing/legacy web applications for a coherent eco-system.
Educational Requirements
Bachelor’s (4 years) degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Electrical Engineering or any relevant background from reputed public or private university.
Required Experience
Candidates with 4 years of experience in relevant field will be preferred.
Essential Skills
In-depth knowledge of Programming languages (.Net MVC / MVC Core)
Experience on web service integration (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML)
Good understanding of HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, Angular JS
Microsoft SQL Server Administration and Development
Crystal Reports and/or Microsoft Reporting
Additional requirements
Excellent communication skills
Pro-active to take challenging responsibilities
Ability to work independently and in a team environment

Salary: 100K+ (negotiable)

Work days: Sunday to Thursday excluding all govt holidays, i.e., Friday & Saturday weekend
Work hours: 9:00 am to 6:00 pm
Leave entitlement: 18 days Annual Leave, carried forward to next year up to 60 working days
12 days Casual Leave
15-120 calendar days sick leave depending on years of service
Maternity Leave 6 months
Etc.

Besides, company provides Leave Fare Assistance, Profit Share, 2 bonuses (in gross salary), Provident fund, gratuity, Full medical coverage for employee, group medical coverage for spouse and children and so on. But MetLife does not like selling this benefit package, rather they believe in attracting candidates who has genuine interest in the role profile and has the mentality and potential to continuously learn and grow.

Email your well formatted CV with a cover letter to sangita.dutta@metlife.com.bd

Author: Nur Nahar
Text:
We have some openings in our Platform Team at Astha IT Ventures (www.asthait.com), and hence are looking for some gifted programmers. Email us your resume at jobs@asthait.com only if you comply with the following:
1) You are extremely good at algorithms and solving complex computational problems.
2) You understand and use several GoF and non-GoF design patterns in your daily coding.
3) You either have experience or have a very clear understanding of distributed programming principles, such as: microservices, REST API, messaging using RabbitMQ, Kafka or any other engines, etc.
4) You have superlative competence in .NET MVC, Web API or Core.
5) You understand that everyone can write a software that can support hundreds of users easily, but only the very best can write a software that can support millions of users concurrently, and you are one of those programmers who has a clear understanding of achieving that level of scalability.
6) Your professional (non-freelance) work experience is >= 2 years and <= 8 years.
7) You are looking for a monthly salary between BDT. 70K - 120K.
If you AND your answers and the result is still YES, know that we are looking for you. Otherwise, please don't waste your and our time. We wish you all the best. Thank you.

Author: Jalal Uddin
Text:
Some special features of IT Firm/IT related companies in Bangladesh which you may not find in any other countries:
No follow-up after interview - so far I have found 2 companies - "Welldev" and "Rokomari" who give a mail to the candidates whom they don't select after interview. 99% companies don't care to do that.
Don't have any properly planned screening process - recently I have been called for interview in a well-known IT Firm who are in the business since 2005. 4 viva, 1 practical test and 1 written test were taken in one day. I had to answer almost similar questions in all 4 vivas. Since it is a technical job, I think they should take a practical test first. After evaluating my test they should understand if I have enough technical skills for the job and call me for an interview if they find my skills are suitable.
Don't have a pre-determined timeline period for screening processes - I was called for giving Technical exam in one of the reputed Telecommunication Companies. After the exam, they took almost 2 months to call for interview. I mean, who would expect to be called for interview after two months? Usually I wait for 1-2 weeks for a call. After that I forget about them. (It has been another two months after interview. And I never heard from them since. I presume they have chosen someone else)
Don't share salary and other benefits - I think they are afraid of or ashamed of sharing information about their budget for salary and other benefits for the employees. Back to the IT company where I have given 4 vivas, 1 written and 1 practical test. After all tests, they told me my salary expectation is higher than their budget. They didn't tell me how much they were planning to offer and even they didn't mention their salary range in the job circular they posted. If the companies would mention salary range in the job post then many job-seekers wouldn't apply for the job if the salary doesn't suit for them and thus time would have been saved for both sides. Their expectations are Sky High but when it comes to offer salary and benefits, they seem to be the most miserable company in the world.
Why do they have to be such an A-hole?

Text:
We are looking for an experienced iOS Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to its limit and will work on our Enterprise-level Legal Case Management System. 

Please include your responses against following queries in your cover letter while sending the application. 

Do you have ACM problem-solving skills? 
Have you ever imagine to work on the product which would be the most intuitive, agile, scalable?
Would you feel proud to invent something new?
Are you passionate about developing the iOS app?
Do you want to challenge yourself to be part of the team who has invented one of the best Legal Case Management Systems?
Do you wish to challenge you as an iOS/Android Developer in taking the software to another level?
Are you compassionate?
Do you hold the highest level of integrity?

**If above are your core qualities then we at Hoxro Dev Centre ( www.hoxro.com ) are looking for you!**

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

REQUIREMENTS:

3+ years’ of mobile app development experience focused on iOS platform 
Must have published 5 or more iOS apps in the app store
Must have working experience in iOS development, proficient in Swift, Xcode, and Objective-C
Have experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc
Detailed knowledge of iOS technologies including networking, data, and UI frameworks, and the application lifecycle

Good problem solving, analytical and troubleshooting skills.
Working knowledge of RESTful services
High integrity, accountability, a positive attitude, and be willing to do what it takes to make the team successful
Proven ability to manage priorities and timelines 
Extremely responsive, with a strong sense of urgency 
Responsible, conscientious, organized, self-motivated and able to work with limited supervision 
Strong communication skills, both oral and written. Including the ability to work with all management levels.

EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
B.Sc/M.Sc in Computer Science & Engineering from any reputed public or private university

# COMPENSATION & OTHER BENEFITS:
To work on a Single Enterprise Level Web Application
Resident Company is UK and Domain is Legal Documentation and Workflow (Our system is used by Lawyers to run their cases)
5 Working days
Two festival bonus each year
Lunch & Snack

Friendly working environment

** 30-60K BDT ( Based on experience and skills )

- Ensure the quality of developed feature without the support of additional QA. Confirm unit testing by framework or by execution of function.
- Should be able to work on already developed product as maintenance
- Requirement analysis & design for Android mobile application development.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Experience on dev/ops is preferred
Salary: 50K to 90K based on experience and skillsets
Benefits:
- Two festival bonus ( 90% of gross salary in each festival)
- Project Incentive (1.5% of the project value for timely delivery)
- Gratuity
- Earned leave encashment
- Company Profit share
- Medical Insurance (Spouse and 2 kids). Card based facility and no payment within limit
- Life Insurance
- Office lunch
- Earned/Casual/Sick leave policy
- TA/DA provided by company
Pls email your CV to kamrul@amarroom.com

Author: Kajemul Haque
Text:
Mayalogy Private Ltd. is looking for a Data Scientist
MAYA - the first ever organization to participate in Google Launchpad and fastest growing App in Bangladesh. If you’d like to be a part of a dynamic, fast-paced work environment with challenges on a regular basis, read on
We are looking for a Data Scientist to analyze large amounts of raw information to find patterns that will help us better understand our portfolio companies. We will rely on you to build data products to extract valuable business insights.
In this role, one should be highly analytical with a knack for analysis, mathematics and statistics. Critical thinking and problem-solving skills are essential for interpreting data. We also want to see a passion for machine-learning and research.
Your goal will be to help our company analyze trends to make better decisions.
# Responsibilities:
Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes
Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data
Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns
Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
Combine models through ensemble modeling
Present information using data visualization techniques
Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges
Collaborate with engineering and product development teams
# Requirements:
Proven experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst
Experience in data mining
Understanding of machine-learning and operations research
Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++ is an asset
Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop)
Analytical mind and business acumen
Strong math skills (e.g. statistics, algebra)
Problem-solving aptitude
Excellent communication and presentation skills
BSc/MSc in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field; graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative field is preferred
# Job Nature: Full time
# Salary Range: Negotiable
# Location: Banani, Dhaka.
# Other Benefit:
Two days weekend
Two festival bonus
Friendly working environment
If interested please send your resume to jobs@maya.com.bd with subject [JOB] Data Scientist
# Company Information:
Mayalogy Private Ltd.
Web: https://www.maya.com.bd
